  3398                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3399                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3400                                  
  3401                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3402                                  
  3403                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3404                                  ;
  3405                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3406                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3407                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3408                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3409                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3410                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3411                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3412                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3413                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3414                                  ;
  3415                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3416                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3417                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3418                                  ;
  3419                                  ;	uses:	
  3420                                  ;
  3421                                  ;
  3422                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3423                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3424                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3425                                  ;
  3426                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3427                                  
  3428                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3429                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3430                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3431                                  
  3432                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3433                                  
  3434                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3435                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3436                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3437                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3438                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3439                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3440                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3441                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3442                                  
  3443                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3444                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3445                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3446                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3447                                  
  3448                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3449 000012D2 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3450 000012D5 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3451 000012D7 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3452 000012DA 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3453 000012DC 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3454 000012DF 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3455                                  atd1:
  3456 000012E1 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3457                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3458                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3459                                  
  3460                                  atd2:					
  3461 000012E6 53                      		push	bx
  3462 000012E7 51                      		push	cx
  3463 000012E8 52                      		push	dx
  3464 000012E9 57                      		push	di
  3465 000012EA 1E                      		push	ds
  3466 000012EB 06                      		push	es
  3467 000012EC 50                      		push	ax
  3468 000012ED B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3469                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3470 000012F0 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3471                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3472 000012F2 C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3473                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3474                                  					; initially no error code.
  3475 000012F7 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3476 000012FA 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3477                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3478 000012FE 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3479                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3480 00001300 C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3481 00001305 EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3482                                  					; return
  3483                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3484                                  
  3485                                  atd3:					
  3486 00001307 53                      		push	bx
  3487 00001308 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3488 0000130A C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3489 0000130D 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3490 0000130F 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3491 00001311 5B                      		pop	bx
  3492 00001312 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3493 00001315 0E                      		push	cs
  3494 00001316 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3495 00001319 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3496 0000131B 58                      		pop	ax
  3497 0000131C 50                      		push	ax
  3498 0000131D E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3499 00001320 BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3500 00001323 EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3501 00001324 E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3502                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3503                                  
  3504                                  atd4:	
  3505                                  
  3506                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3507                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3508                                  				
  3509 00001327 58                      		pop	ax
  3510                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3511 00001328 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3512 0000132C 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3513 0000132E 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3514 00001330 F9                      		stc
  3515                                  atd5:					
  3516 00001331 07                      		pop	es
  3517 00001332 1F                      		pop	ds
  3518 00001333 5F                      		pop	di
  3519 00001334 5A                      		pop	dx
  3520 00001335 59                      		pop	cx
  3521 00001336 5B                      		pop	bx
  3522 00001337 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3523                                  
  3524                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3525                                  
  3526                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3527                                  ;
  3528                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3529                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3530                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3531                                  ;	
  3532                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3533                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3534                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3535                                  ;
  3536                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3537                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3538                                  ;
  3539                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3540                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3541                                  
  3542                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3543                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3544                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3545 0000133A A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3546                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3547 0000133D C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3548 00001342 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3549 00001345 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3550 00001347 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3551                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3552                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3553                                  setc1:					
  3554 0000134C 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3555 0000134E 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3556                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3557                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3558 00001350 A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3559 00001353 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3560 00001357 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3561 00001359 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3562                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3563 0000135C A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3564 0000135F 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3565 00001361 C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3566 00001364 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3567 00001367 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3568 00001369 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3569                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3570 0000136B A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3571 0000136E 06                      		push	es
  3572 0000136F 53                      		push	bx
  3573 00001370 0E                      		push	cs
  3574 00001371 E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3575 00001374 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3576                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3577 00001378 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3578                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3579 0000137B A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3580                                  					; only use low part
  3581 0000137E 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3582                                  					; control byte modifier
  3583 00001382 5B                      		pop	bx
  3584 00001383 07                      		pop	es
  3585                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3586 00001384 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3587 00001388 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3588 0000138B 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3589                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3590 0000138D 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3591 00001391 C3                      		retn
  3592                                  
  3593                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3594                                  
  3595                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3596                                  ;
  3597                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3598                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3599                                  ;
  3600                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3601                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3602                                  ;
  3603                                  ;	
  3604                                  ;
  3605                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3606                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3607                                  ;
  3608                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3609                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3610                                  
  3611                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3612 00001392 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3613 00001394 0E                      		push	cs
  3614 00001395 E84000                  		call	command
  3615 00001398 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3616                                  doc1:					
  3617 0000139A 0E                      		push	cs
  3618 0000139B E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3619 0000139E 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3620 000013A0 B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3621 000013A3 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3622 000013A6 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3623 000013A7 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3624                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3625                                  
  3626                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3627                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3628                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3629                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3630                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3631                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3632                                  ;
  3633                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3634                                  
  3635                                  rsct_loop:				
  3636 000013A8 6D                      		insw
  3637 000013A9 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3638 000013AB FB                      		sti
  3639                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3640 000013AC F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3641                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3642                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3643 000013B1 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3644 000013B3 0E                      		push	cs
  3645 000013B4 E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3646 000013B7 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3647 000013B9 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3648 000013BC BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3649 000013BF FA                      		cli
  3650 000013C0 F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3651 000013C2 FB                      		sti
  3652                                  doc2:					
  3653 000013C3 0E                      		push	cs
  3654 000013C4 E82900                  		call	check_status
  3655 000013C7 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3656                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3657 000013C9 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3658 000013CD 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3659                                  doc3:					
  3660 000013CF C3                      		retn
  3661                                  
  3662                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3663                                  
  3664                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3665                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3666                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3667                                  
  3668                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3669                                  
  3670                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3671                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3672                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3673                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3674                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3675                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3676                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3677                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3678                                  
  3679                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3680                                  ;
  3681                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3682                                  ;
  3683                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3684                                  ;
  3685                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3686                                  ;
  3687                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3688                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3689                                  ;	
  3690                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3691                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3692                                  
  3693                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3694                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3695                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3696                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3697 000013D0 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3698 000013D3 EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3699                                  
  3700                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3701                                  
  3702                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3703                                  ;
  3704                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3705                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3706                                  ;
  3707                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3708                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3709                                  ;
  3710                                  ;
  3711                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3712                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3713                                  ;
  3714                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3715                                  
  3716                                  command:	; proc near		
  3717                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3718                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3719                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3720 000013D8 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3721 000013DB EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3722                                  
  3723                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3724                                  
  3725                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3726                                  ;
  3727                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3728                                  ;
  3729                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3730                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3731                                  ;
  3732                                  ;
  3733                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3734                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3735                                  ;		
  3736                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3737                                  
  3738                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3739                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3740                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3741                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3742 000013E0 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3743 000013E3 EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3744                                  
  3745                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3746                                  
  3747                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3748                                  ;
  3749                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3750                                  ;
  3751                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3752                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3753                                  ;
  3754                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3755                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3756                                  
  3757                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3758                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3759                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3760                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3761 000013E8 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3762 000013EB EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3763                                  
  3764                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3765                                  
  3766                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3767                                  ;
  3768                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3769                                  ;
  3770                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3771                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3772                                  ;
  3773                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3774                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3775                                  
  3776                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3777                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3778                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3779                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3780 000013F0 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3781 000013F3 EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3782                                  
  3783                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3784                                  
  3785                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3786                                  ;
  3787                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3788                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3789                                  ;
  3790                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3791                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3792                                  ;
  3793                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3794                                  
  3795                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3796                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3797                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3798                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3799 000013F8 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3800 000013FB EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3801                                  
  3802                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3803                                  
  3804                                  endatrom:
  3805                                  
  3806                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3807                                  
  3808                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3809                                  ;;
  3810                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3811                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3812                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3813                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3814                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3815                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3816                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3817                                  
  3818                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3819 00001400 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3820                                  					;
  3821                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3822                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3823                                  					;
  3824                                  					; warning!!!
  3825                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3826 00001403 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3827                                  no_hookit:				
  3828                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3829                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3830 00001405 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3831                                  
  3832                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3833                                  
  3834                                  mebbe_hookit:				
  3835 0000140A 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3836 0000140D 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3837 0000140F 1E                      		push	ds
  3838 00001410 50                      		push	ax
  3839 00001411 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h
  3840 00001414 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3841 00001416 58                      		pop	ax
  3842 00001417 9C                      		pushf
  3843                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3844                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3845 00001418 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3846 0000141D 1F                      		pop	ds
  3847 0000141E CA0200                  		retf	2
  3848                                  
  3849                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3850                                  
  3851 00001421 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3852                                  
  3853                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3854                                  
  3855                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3856                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3857                                  
  3858                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3859                                  
  3860                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3861                                  ;
  3862                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3863                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3864                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3865                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3866                                  
  3867                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3868 00001422 2EFF36[E904]            		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3869 00001427 2E813E[E904]891C        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3870                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3871 0000142E 730E                    		jnb	short century20
  3872 00001430 2EC606[ED04]13          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3873 00001436 2EC606[EE04]50          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3874 0000143C EB13                    		jmp	short years
  3875                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3876                                  		
  3877                                  century20:				
  3878 0000143E 2EC606[ED04]14          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3879 00001444 2EC606[EE04]00          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3880 0000144A 2E812E[E904]891C        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3881                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3882                                  years:					
  3883 00001451 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3884 00001453 2EA1[E904]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3885 00001457 BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3886                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3887 0000145A F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3888 0000145C 2E8916[E904]            		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3889 00001461 B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  3890 00001463 F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3891 00001465 2E0006[EE04]            		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  3892 0000146A 2EFF06[E904]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  3893 0000146F 2E813E[E904]6E01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  3894 00001476 7626                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  3895 00001478 2EFE06[EE04]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  3896 0000147D 2E812E[E904]6E01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  3897 00001484 B90300                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  3898                                  regularyear:				
  3899 00001487 2E813E[E904]6D01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  3900 0000148E 7614                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  3901 00001490 2EFE06[EE04]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  3902 00001495 2E812E[E904]6D01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  3903 0000149C E2E9                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  3904                                  					;
  3905                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3906                                  leapyear:				
  3907 0000149E 2EC606[F004]1D          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3908                                  					; change month table.
  3909                                  yeardone:				
  3910 000014A4 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  3911 000014A6 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3912 000014A8 2EA1[E904]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3913                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3914 000014AC BE[EF04]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3915 000014AF B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12
  3916                                  months:					
  3917 000014B2 FEC3                    		inc	bl
  3918                                  
  3919                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3920                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3921                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3922                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3923                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3924                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3925                                  		
  3926 000014B4 8A14                    		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3927 000014B6 39D0                    		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3928                                  					; dh=0
  3929 000014B8 7605                    		jbe	short month_done
  3930 000014BA 46                      		inc	si		; next month
  3931 000014BB 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3932 000014BD E2F3                    		loop	months		;
  3933                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3934                                  month_done:				
  3935 000014BF 2EC606[F004]1C          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3936                                  					; restore month table value
  3937 000014C5 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
  3938 000014C7 2E8A36[EE04]            		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3939 000014CC 2E8A0E[ED04]            		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3940 000014D1 2EFF1E[FB04]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3941                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3942                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3943 000014D6 86D0                    		xchg	dl, al
  3944 000014D8 2EFF1E[FB04]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3945                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3946 000014DD 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al
  3947 000014DF 2EFF1E[FB04]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3948                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3949 000014E4 86C8                    		xchg	cl, al
  3950 000014E6 2EFF1E[FB04]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3951                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3952 000014EB 88C5                    		mov	ch, al
  3953 000014ED 2E8F06[E904]            		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3954 000014F2 CB                      		retf
  3955                                  
  3956                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3957                                  
  3958                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3959                                  
  3960                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3961                                  
  3962                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3963                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3964                                  		
  3965 000014F3 51                      		push	cx		
  3966 000014F4 D40A                    		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bc
  3967 000014F6 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  3968 000014F8 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3969 000014FA 08E0                    		or	al, ah
  3970 000014FC 59                      		pop	cx
  3971 000014FD CB                      		retf
  3972                                  
  3973                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3974                                  
  3975                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3976                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3977                                  
  3978                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3979                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3980                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3981                                  
  3982                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3983                                  
  3984                                  int6c:					
  3985 000014FE 0E                      		push	cs
  3986 000014FF 1F                      		pop	ds
  3987 00001500 8F06[B206]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3988 00001504 8F06[B406]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3989 00001508 9D                      		popf
  3990 00001509 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  3991 0000150C FA                      		cli
  3992 0000150D 8936[E904]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  3993 00001511 FB                      		sti
  3994 00001512 E8CB00                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  3995 00001515 FA                      		cli
  3996 00001516 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  3997 00001518 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  3998                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  3999                                  					; Return: time of day set
  4000 0000151A FB                      		sti
  4001                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  4002                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4003 0000151B FF2E[B206]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  4004                                  
  4005                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4006                                  
  4007                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  4008                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  4009                                  
  4010                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  4011 0000151F 50                      		push	ax
  4012 00001520 51                      		push	cx
  4013 00001521 52                      		push	dx
  4014 00001522 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  4015 00001524 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  4016                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  4017                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  4018                                  					; midnight
  4019                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  4020 00001526 5A                      		pop	dx
  4021 00001527 59                      		pop	cx
  4022 00001528 58                      		pop	ax
  4023 00001529 50                      		push	ax
  4024 0000152A 53                      		push	bx
  4025 0000152B 51                      		push	cx
  4026 0000152C 52                      		push	dx
  4027 0000152D 2EC706[D206]0100        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  4028                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  4029 00001534 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  4030 00001536 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4031                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  4032                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  4033                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  4034                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  4035 00001538 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  4036 0000153A E99300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  4037                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4038                                  
  4039                                  read_ok:				
  4040 0000153D 882E[B606]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  4041 00001541 880E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  4042 00001545 8836[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  4043 00001549 8816[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  4044 0000154D 2EC706[D206]0200        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  4045 00001554 E84201                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  4046 00001557 7277                    		jb	short r_d_ret	;  some	value out of range
  4047 00001559 2EC706[D206]0300        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  4048 00001560 E8E600                  		call	date_verify
  4049 00001563 726B                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  4050 00001565 2EC706[D206]0000        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  4051 0000156C E8AA00                  		call	in_bin
  4052 0000156F A0[B706]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  4053 00001572 98                      		cbw
  4054 00001573 803E[B606]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  4055 00001578 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  4056 0000157A 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  4057                                  
  4058                                  century_19:				
  4059 0000157D 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  4060 00001580 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  4061 00001582 F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  4062 00001584 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  4063 00001586 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  4064 00001587 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  4065                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  4066 0000158A F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4067 0000158C 2EA3[D206]              		mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  4068 00001590 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  4069 00001592 98                      		cbw
  4070 00001593 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  4071 00001595 740C                    		jz	short leap_year
  4072 00001597 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  4073 0000159A F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4074 0000159C 2E0106[D206]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  4075 000015A1 EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  4076                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  4077                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4078                                  
  4079                                  leap_year:				
  4080 000015A3 803E[B806]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  4081 000015A8 7605                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  4082                                  leap_adjustment:			
  4083 000015AA 2EFF06[D206]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  4084                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  4085 000015AF 8A0E[B906]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  4086 000015B3 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4087 000015B5 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  4088 000015B6 2E010E[D206]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  4089 000015BB 8A0E[B806]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  4090 000015BF 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4091 000015C1 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  4092 000015C2 D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  4093 000015C4 BE[BA06]                		mov	si, month_table
  4094 000015C7 01CE                    		add	si, cx
  4095                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4096                                  		; ds must be same with cs here, if so..
  4097                                  		; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  4098                                  		; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  4099                                  		; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  4100 000015C9 8B04                    		mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  4101                                  					; get #	days in	previous months
  4102 000015CB 2E0106[D206]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax
  4103                                  r_d_ret:				
  4104 000015D0 2E8B36[D206]            		mov	si, [cs:daycnt2]
  4105 000015D5 5A                      		pop	dx
  4106 000015D6 59                      		pop	cx
  4107 000015D7 5B                      		pop	bx
  4108 000015D8 58                      		pop	ax
  4109 000015D9 C3                      		retn
  4110                                  
  4111                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4112                                  
  4113                                  r_t_retj:				
  4114 000015DA 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4115 000015DC 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  4116 000015DE EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  4117                                  
  4118                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4119                                  
  4120                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  4121                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  4122                                  
  4123                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  4124 000015E0 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  4125 000015E2 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4126                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  4127                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  4128                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  4129 000015E4 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4130 000015E6 882E[B606]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  4131 000015EA 880E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  4132 000015EE 8836[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  4133 000015F2 C606[B906]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  4134 000015F7 E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  4135 000015FA 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4136 000015FC E88500                  		call	time_verify
  4137 000015FF 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4138 00001601 E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  4139 00001604 8A2E[B606]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  4140 00001608 8A0E[B706]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  4141 0000160C 8A36[B806]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  4142 00001610 8A16[B906]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  4143                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4144                                  		; 17/09/2022
  4145                                  		; 31/05/2019
  4146 00001614 FF1E[D906]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  4147                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  4148                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  4149                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  4150                                  r_t_ret:				
  4151 00001618 C3                      		retn
  4152                                  
  4153                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4154                                  
  4155                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  4156                                  
  4157                                  in_bin:		; proc near		
  4158 00001619 A0[B606]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  4159 0000161C E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4160 0000161F A2[B606]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  4161 00001622 A0[B706]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  4162 00001625 E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4163 00001628 A2[B706]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  4164 0000162B A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4165 0000162E E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4166 00001631 A2[B806]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4167 00001634 A0[B906]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4168 00001637 E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4169 0000163A A2[B906]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4170 0000163D C3                      		retn
  4171                                  
  4172                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4173                                  
  4174                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4175                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4176                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4177                                  
  4178                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near		
  4179 0000163E 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4180 00001640 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4181 00001642 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4182 00001644 D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4183 00001646 D50A                    		aad
  4184 00001648 C3                      		retn
  4185                                  
  4186                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4187                                  
  4188                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4189                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4190                                  
  4191                                  date_verify:	; proc near		
  4192 00001649 803E[B606]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4193 0000164E 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4194 00001650 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4195 00001652 803E[B606]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4196                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4197                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4198 00001657 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4199 00001659 803E[B706]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4200                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4201                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4202 0000165E 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4203                                  century_20:				
  4204 00001660 803E[B706]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4205 00001665 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4206 00001667 803E[B806]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4207 0000166C 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4208 0000166E 803E[B806]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4209                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4210 00001673 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4211 00001675 803E[B906]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4212 0000167A 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4213                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4214                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4215                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4216                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4217                                  		; cf=0
  4218                                  		;clc
  4219                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4220 0000167C 803E[B906]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4221 00001681 C3                      		retn
  4222                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4223                                  
  4224                                  date_error:				
  4225 00001682 F9                      		stc
  4226                                  date_err2:
  4227 00001683 C3                      		retn
  4228                                  
  4229                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4230                                  
  4231                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4232                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4233                                  
  4234                                  time_verify:	; proc near		
  4235 00001684 803E[B606]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4236 00001689 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4237 0000168B 803E[B706]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4238 00001690 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4239                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4240                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4241                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4242                                  		;clc
  4243                                  		;retn
  4244                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4245 00001692 803E[B806]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4246                                  time_error:
  4247                                  bv_error:	
  4248 00001697 F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4249 00001698 C3                      		retn
  4250                                  
  4251                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4252                                  
  4253                                  ;time_error:				
  4254                                  		;stc
  4255                                  		;retn
  4256                                  
  4257                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4258                                  
  4259                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4260                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4261                                  
  4262                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near		
  4263 00001699 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4264 0000169C BB[B606]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4265                                  bv_loop:				
  4266 0000169F 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4267 000016A1 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4268 000016A3 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4269                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4270 000016A6 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4271 000016A8 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4272 000016AA D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4273 000016AC D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4274 000016AE D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4275 000016B0 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4276 000016B2 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4277 000016B5 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4278 000016B8 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4279 000016BA 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4280 000016BB 49                      		dec	cx
  4281 000016BC 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4282 000016BE F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4283 000016BF C3                      		retn
  4284                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4285                                  
  4286                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4287                                  ;bv_error:				
  4288                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4289                                  		;retn
  4290                                  
  4291                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4292                                  
  4293                                  endk09:

  4297                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4298                                  ;									:
  4299                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4300                                  ;									:
  4301                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4302                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4303                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4304                                  ;									:
  4305                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4306                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4307                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4308                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4309                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4310                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4311                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4312                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4313                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4314                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4315                                  ;		this program.						:
  4316                                  ;									:
  4317                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4318                                  
  4319                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4320                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4321

  4335 000016CD 80                      rom_drv_num:	db 80h			; rom drive number
  4336 000016CE 0002                    md_sectorsize:	dw 200h			; used by get_fat_sector proc.

  4339 000016D0 FFFF                    last_fat_sec_num: dw 0FFFFh		; used by get_fat_sector proc.

  4399                                  ; the following are the recommended bpbs for the media that we know of so far.
  4400                                  
  4401                                  ;struc bpbx
  4402                                  ;   resw 1 ; 512
  4403                                  ;   resb 1
  4404                                  ;   resw 1 ; 1
  4405                                  ;   resb 1 ; 2
  4406                                  ;   resw 1
  4407                                  ;   resw 1
  4408                                  ;   resb 1
  4409                                  ;   resw 1

  4411                                  ;   resw 1 ; 2
  4412                                  ;   resw 1

  4414                                  ;   resd 1 ; extended total sectors
  4415                                  ;.size:

  4421                                  
  4422                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0) IO.SYS
  4423                                  
  4424                                  ; 09/12/2022
  4425                                  BPB48T:
  4426                                  ;bpb48t:	; bpbx <512, 2, 1, 2, 112, 720, 0FDh, 2, 9, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0> 
  4427                                  		; 48 tpi diskettes	;
  4428                                  		dw	512		; physical sector size in bytes
  4429                                  		db	2		; sectors/allocation unit
  4430                                  		dw	1		; reserved sectors for dos
  4431                                  		db	2		; number of allocation tables
  4432                                  		dw	112		; number of directory entries
  4433                                  		dw	720 ; 2*9*40	; number of sectors (at 512 bytes each)
  4434                                  		db	0FDh		; media descriptor
  4435                                  		dw	2		; number of fat sectors
  4436                                  		dw	9		; sectors per track
  4437                                  		dw	2		; heads
  4438                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector count (low word)
  4439                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)
  4440                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (low)
  4441                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (high)					
  4442                                  
  4443                                  		db 90h
  4444                                  ;align 2
  4445                                  BPB96T:
  4446                                  ;bpb96t:	; bpbx <512, 1, 1, 2, 224, 2400, 0F9h, 7, 15, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0> 
  4447                                  		; 96 tpi diskettes	;
  4448                                  		dw	512		; physical sector size in bytes
  4449                                  		db	1		; sectors/allocation unit
  4450                                  		dw	1		; reserved sectors for dos
  4451                                  		db	2		; number of allocation tables
  4452                                  		dw	224		; number of directory entries
  4453                                  		dw	2400 ; 2*15*80	; number of sectors (at 512 bytes each)
  4454                                  		db	0F9h		; media descriptor
  4455                                  		dw	7		; number of fat sectors
  4456                                  		dw	15		; sectors per track
  4457                                  		dw	2		; heads
  4458                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector count (low word)
  4459                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)
  4460                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (low)
  4461                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (high)
  4462                                  
  4463                                  		db 90h
  4464                                  ;align 2
  4465                                  BPB35:
  4466                                  ;bpb35:		; bpbx <512, 2, 1, 2, 112, 1440, 0F9h, 3, 9, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0> 
  4467                                  		; 3.5" diskettes - 720 KB ;		
  4468                                  		dw	512		; physical sector size in bytes
  4469                                  		db	2		; sectors/allocation unit
  4470                                  		dw	1		; reserved sectors for dos
  4471                                  		db	2		; number of allocation tables
  4472                                  		dw	112		; number of directory entries
  4473                                  		dw	1440 ; 2*9*80	; number of sectors (at 512 bytes each)
  4474                                  		db	0F9h		; media descriptor
  4475                                  		dw	3		; number of fat sectors
  4476                                  		dw	9		; sectors per track
  4477                                  		dw	2		; heads
  4478                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector count (low word)
  4479                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)
  4480                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (low)
  4481                                  		dw	0		; number of sectors (high)
  4482                                  
  4483                                  		db 90h
  4484                                  ;align 2
  4485                                  
  4486                                  ;align 2
  4487                                  ;BPB144:

  4489                                  ;

  4491                                  ;		db	1		; sectors/allocation unit
  4492                                  ;		dw	1		; reserved sectors for dos
  4493                                  ;		db	2		; number of allocation tables
  4494                                  ;		dw	224		; number of directory entries
  4495                                  ;		dw	2880 ; 2*18*80	; number of sectors (at 512 bytes each)
  4496                                  ;		db	0F0h		; media descriptor
  4497                                  ;		dw	9		; number of fat sectors
  4498                                  ;		dw	18		; sectors per track
  4499                                  ;		dw	2		; heads
  4500                                  ;		dw	0		; hidden sector count (low word)
  4501                                  ;		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)
  4502                                  ;		dw	0		; number of sectors (low)
  4503                                  ;		dw	0		; number of sectors (high)
  4504                                  ;
  4505                                  ;		db 90h
  4506                                  ;align 2
  4507

  4509                                  ;bpb288:	; bpbx <512, 2, 1, 2, 240, 5760, 0F0h, 9, 36, 2, 0, 0, 0, 0>
  4510                                  		; 3.5" diskettes - 2.88 MB ;

  4518                                  		dw	3		; number of fat sectors

  4522                                  		dw	0		; hidden sector (high)

  4525

  4527                                  ;align 2
  4528                                  
  4529                                  %endif
  4530                                  
  4531                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4532                                  					; align	2
  4533                                  ; 09/12/2022
  4534                                  %if 0

  4536                                  		dw bpb96t		; 96tpi	drives
  4537                                  		dw bpb35		; 3.5" drives
  4538                                  		dw bpb35		; unused 8" diskette
  4539                                  		dw bpb35		; unused 8" diskette

  4547                                  %endif

  4550                                  %if 0
  4551                                  BPBTABLE:	dw BPB48T		; 48tpi	drives
  4552                                  		dw BPB96T		; 96tpi	drives
  4553                                  		dw BPB35		; 3.5" drives
  4554                                  		dw BPB35		; unused 8" diskette
  4555                                  		dw BPB35		; unused 8" diskette

  4563

  4566                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4567                                  
  4568                                  ;	entry point to call utility functions in Bios_Code. At this time,
  4569                                  ;	  we aren't doing any A20 switching. During MSINIT time Bios_Code
  4570                                  ;	  will not yet be moved to its final resting place, so we know
  4571                                  ;	  it'll be low.
  4572                                  ;
  4573                                  ;	to use this function, do a "push cs" and load bp with the offset of
  4574                                  ;	  the function you want to call in Bios_Code. This routine will
  4575                                  ;	  push the address of a retf in Bios_Code onto the stack which
  4576                                  ;	  will get executed when the utility function finishes. It will
  4577                                  ;	  then transfer control to Bios_Code:bp using a couple of pushes
  4578                                  ;	  and a retf
  4579                                  
  4580                                  ; 16/10/2022
  4581                                  ;BC_RETF equ bc_retf - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  4582                                  ; 09/12/2022
  4583                                  BC_RETF equ bc_retf
  4584                                  
  4585                                  addr_of_bcretf:	;dw 0C8h		; dw bc_retf
  4586                                  					; 2C7h:0C8h = 70h:2638h
  4587 00001757 [C800]                  		dw BC_RETF
  4588                                  
  4589                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4590                                  
  4591                                  call_bios_code:	; proc far			
  4592 00001759 2EFF36[5717]            		push	word [cs:addr_of_bcretf] 
  4593                                  					; set up near return to far return
  4594 0000175E 2EFF36[D706]            		push	word [cs:cdev+2] ; push Bios_Code segment
  4595 00001763 55                      		push	bp		; save offset of utility function
  4596 00001764 CB                      		retf			; far jump to (DOS)BIOS code
  4597                                  
  4598                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4599                                  
  4600 00001765 00                      flp_drvs	db 0
