 10738                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10739                                  
 10740                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 10741                                  ; read in the boot sector. set carry if error in reading sector.
 10742                                  ; bx is set to 1 if the boot sector is invalid, otherwise it is 0.
 10743                                  ;
 10744                                  ;	assumes es:di -> bds, ds-> Bios_Data
 10745                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
 10746                                  
 10747                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10748                                  
 10749                                  readbootsec:	
 10750 000006A6 B600                    		mov	dh, 0		; head 0
 10751 000006A8 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; cylinder 0, sector 1
 10752 000006AB E8BF00                  		call	read_sector
 10753 000006AE 7243                    		jb	short err_ret
 10754 000006B0 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; assume valid boot sector
 10755                                  
 10756                                  		; put a sanity check for the boot sector in here to detect
 10757                                  		; boot sectors that do not have valid bpbs. we examine the
 10758                                  		; first two bytes - they must contain a long jump (69h) or a
 10759                                  		; short jump (EBh) followed by a nop (90h), or a short jump
 10760                                  		; (E9h). if this test is passed, we further check by examining
 10761                                  		; the signature at the end of the boot sector for the word
 10762                                  		; AA55h. if the signature is not present, we examine the media
 10763                                  		; descriptor byte to see if it is valid. for dos 3.3, this
 10764                                  		; logic is modified a little bit. we are not going to check
 10765                                  		; signature. instead we are going to sanity check the media
 10766                                  		; byte in bpb regardless of the validity of signature. this is
 10767                                  		; to save the already developed commercial products that have
 10768                                  		; good jump instruction and signature but with the false bpb
 10769                                  		; informations
 10770                                  
 10771                                  ; that will crash the diskette drive operation. (for example, symphony diskette).
 10772                                  
 10773                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10774                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10775                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 69h ; is it a direct jump?
 10776                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; don't need to find a nop
 10777                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0E9h ; dos 2.0 jump?
 10778                                  		;jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; no need for	nop
 10779                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector], 0EBh ; how about a short jump?
 10780                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10781                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10782                                  		;jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10783                                  
 10784                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 10785 000006B2 A0[4E01]                		mov	al, [disksector]
 10786 000006B5 3C69                    		cmp	al, 69h		; is it a direct jump?
 10787 000006B7 740F                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10788                                  					; don't need to find a nop
 10789 000006B9 3CE9                    		cmp	al, 0E9h	; dos 2.0 jump?
 10790 000006BB 740B                    		je	short check_bpb_mediabyte
 10791                                  					; no need for nop
 10792 000006BD 3CEB                    		cmp	al, 0EBh	; how about a short jump?
 10793 000006BF 7530                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10794 000006C1 803E[5001]90            		cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
 10795 000006C6 7529                    		jne	short invalidbootsec
 10796                                  
 10797                                  ; 15/10/5022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10798                                  ;
 10799                                  ;; 10/03/2019
 10800                                  ;; (MSDOS 3.3, MSDISK.ASM, 1988)
 10801                                  ;;
 10802                                  ;; Don't have to perform the following signature check since
 10803                                  ;; we need to check the media byte even with the good signatured diskette.
 10804                                  ;;
 10805                                  ;;check_signature:
 10806                                  ;;		cmp	word [cs:disksector+1FEh],0AA55h ; see if non-ibm
 10807                                  ;;							 ; disk or 1.x media.
 10808                                  ;;		jz	short checksinglesided ; go see if single sided medium.
 10809                                  ;;					       ; may need some special handling
 10810                                  
 10811                                  ; check for non-ibm disks which do not have the signature AA55h at the
 10812                                  ; end of the boot sector, but still have a valid boot sector. this is done
 10813                                  ; by examining the media descriptor in the boot sector.
 10814                                  
 10815                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10816                                  check_bpb_mediabyte:			
 10817 000006C8 A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10818                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10819 000006CB 50                      		push	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10820 000006CC 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h
 10821 000006CE 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; allow	for strange media
 10822 000006D0 58                      		pop	ax ; 02/09/2023
 10823 000006D1 751E                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
 10824                                  
 10825                                  ; there were some (apparently a lot of them) diskettes that had been formatted
 10826                                  ; under dos 3.1 and earlier versions which have invalid bpbs in their boot
 10827                                  ; sectors. these are specifically diskettes that were formatted in drives
 10828                                  ; with one head, or whose side 0 was bad. these contain bpbs in the boot
 10829                                  ; sector that have the sec/clus field set to 2 instead of 1, as is standard
 10830                                  ; in dos. in order to support them, we have to introduce a "hack" that will
 10831                                  ; help our build bpb routine to recognise these specific cases, and to
 10832                                  ; set up out copy of the bpb accordingly.
 10833                                  ; we do this by checking to see if the boot sector is off a diskette that
 10834                                  ; is single-sided and is a pre-dos 3.20 diskette. if it is, we set the
 10835                                  ; sec/clus field to 1. if not, we carry on as normal.
 10836                                  
 10837                                  checksinglesided:
 10838                                  		;mov	al, [disksector+15h]
 10839                                  		; 02/09/2023
 10840                                  		; al = [disksector+15h]
 10841 000006D3 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h
 10842 000006D5 741B                    		jz	short gooddsk
 10843 000006D7 A801                    		test	al, 1
 10844 000006D9 7517                    		jnz	short gooddsk
 10845 000006DB 813E[5601]332E          		cmp	word [disksector+8], 2E33h ; "3."
 10846 000006E1 7507                    		jnz	short mustbeearlier
 10847 000006E3 803E[5801]32            		cmp	byte [disksector+0Ah], 32h ; "2"
 10848 000006E8 7308                    		jnb	short gooddsk
 10849                                  
 10850                                  ; we must have a pre-3.20 diskette. set the sec/clus field to 1
 10851                                  
 10852                                  mustbeearlier:				
 10853 000006EA C606[5B01]01            		mov	byte [disksector+0Dh], 1
 10854                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10855 000006EF EB01                    		jmp	short gooddsk
 10856                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10857                                  
 10858                                  invalidbootsec:				
 10859 000006F1 43                      		inc	bx		; indicate that boot sector invalid
 10860                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10861                                  movbpb_ret:
 10862                                  gooddsk:				
 10863 000006F2 F8                      		clc
 10864                                  err_ret:
 10865 000006F3 C3                      		retn
 10866                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10867                                  
 10868                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10869                                  ;err_ret:				
 10870                                  		;retn
 10871                                  
 10872                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10873                                  
 10874                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10875                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10876                                  ; 'movbpb' moves the bpb read from the boot sector into registers for use by
 10877                                  ; getbp routine at has1
 10878                                  ;
 10879                                  ; if the set_id_flag is 1, and if an extended boot record, then set volume
 10880                                  ; serial number, volume label, file system id in bds according to
 10881                                  ; the boot record.  after that, this routine will set the set_id_flag to 2
 10882                                  ; to signal that volume label is set already from the extended boot record
 10883                                  ; (so, don't set it again by calling "set_volume_id" routine which uses
 10884                                  ; the volume label in the root directory.)
 10885                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10886                                  
 10887                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10888                                  
 10889                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10890                                  movbpb:	
 10891 000006F4 8A36[5B01]              		mov	dh, [disksector+0Dh]
 10892                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
 10893                                  					; sectors per unit
 10894 000006F8 8A3E[5F01]              		mov	bh, [disksector+11h]
 10895                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
 10896                                  					; number of directory entries
 10897 000006FC 8B0E[6101]              		mov	cx, [disksector+13h]
 10898                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
 10899                                  					; size of drive
 10900 00000700 8A26[6301]              		mov	ah, [disksector+15h]
 10901                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 10902                                  					; media	descriptor
 10903 00000704 A0[6401]                		mov	al, [disksector+16h];
 10904                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
 10905                                  					; number of fat	sectors
 10906 00000707 8A1E[6601]              		mov	bl, [disksector+18h]
 10907                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERTRACK]
 10908                                  					; sectors per track
 10909 0000070B 8A16[6801]              		mov	dl, [disksector+1Ah]
 10910                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.HEADS]
 10911                                  					; number of heads
 10912 0000070F 803E[0305]01            		cmp	byte [set_id_flag], 1 ; called by get_bpb?
 10913 00000714 75DC                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 10914 00000716 E81200                  		call	mov_media_ids
 10915 00000719 7205                    		jb	short movbpb_conv ; conventional boot record?
 10916 0000071B C606[0305]02            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 2 ; signals that volume id is set
 10917                                  movbpb_conv:				
 10918 00000720 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1
 10919 00000725 75CB                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
 10920 00000727 E88711                  		call	resetchanged	; reset	flags in bds to	not fchanged.
 10921                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10922                                  		; cf = 0
 10923                                  ;movbpb_ret:				
 10924                                  		;clc
 10925 0000072A C3                      		retn
 10926                                  
 10927                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10928                                  
 10929                                  ;copy the boot_serial number, volume id, and filesystem id from the
 10930                                  ;***extended boot record*** in ds:disksector to the bds table pointed
 10931                                  ;by es:di.
 10932                                  
 10933                                  ;in.) es:di -> bds
 10934                                  ;     ds:disksector = valid extended boot record.
 10935                                  ;out.) vol_serial, bds_volid and bds_system_id in bds are set according to
 10936                                  ;      the boot record information.
 10937                                  ;     carry flag set if not an extended bpb.
 10938                                  ;     all registers saved except the flag.
 10939                                  
 10940                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10941                                  mov_media_ids:		
 10942 0000072B 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 10943                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 10944                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 10945 00000730 752C                    		jnz	short mmi_not_ext
 10946 00000732 51                      		push	cx
 10947 00000733 8B0E[7501]              		mov	cx, [disksector+27h]
 10948                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 10949 00000737 26894D57                		mov	[es:di+57h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
 10950 0000073B 8B0E[7701]              		mov	cx, [disksector+29h]
 10951                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 10952 0000073F 26894D59                		mov	[es:di+59h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 10953 00000743 57                      		push	di
 10954 00000744 56                      		push	si
 10955 00000745 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 10956 00000748 BE[7901]                		mov	si, disksector+2Bh
 10957                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+2Bh) ;
 10958                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.VOL_LABEL
 10959 0000074B 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 10960 0000074E F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10961                                  		;mov	cx, 8		; size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 10962                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10963 00000750 B108                    		mov	cl, 8 ; cx = 8
 10964 00000752 BE[8401]                		mov	si, disksector+36h
 10965                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+36h) ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SYSTEM_ID
 10966 00000755 83C705                  		add	di, 5		; (BDS.filesys_id-BDS.volid)-size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 10967 00000758 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 10968 0000075A 5E                      		pop	si
 10969 0000075B 5F                      		pop	di
 10970 0000075C 59                      		pop	cx
 10971                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10972                                  		; cf = 0
 10973                                  		;clc		; this clc is not required (16/06/2019 - Erdogan Tan)
 10974                                  				; (20/09/2022)
 10975 0000075D C3                      		retn
 10976                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10977                                  
 10978                                  mmi_not_ext:				
 10979 0000075E F9                      		stc
 10980 0000075F C3                      		retn
 10981                                  
 10982                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10983                                  
 10984                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10985                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10986                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
 10987                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
 10988                                  ; output:
 10989                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
 10990                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
 10991                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
 10992                                  
 10993                                  readfat:	
 10994                                  		;mov	dh, 0
 10995                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10996 00000760 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10997 00000762 B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
 10998                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2
 10999 00000765 E80500                  		call	read_sector
 11000 00000768 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 11001 0000076A 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
 11002                                  bad_fat_ret:				
 11003 0000076C C3                      		retn
 11004                                  
 11005                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11006                                  
 11007                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11008                                  
 11009                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11010                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 11011                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 11012                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 11013                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 11014                                  ;		dh has head
 11015                                  ;		es:di has bds
 11016                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 11017                                  ;
 11018                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 11019                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 11020                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 11021                                  ;
 11022                                  ;		carry set
 11023                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 11024                                  ;
 11025                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 11026                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11027                                  
 11028                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11029                                  
 11030                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11031                                  read_sector:	
 11032 0000076D 55                      		push	bp
 11033 0000076E BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 11034 00000771 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11035 00000775 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 11036                                  rd_ret:					
 11037 00000778 06                      		push	es
 11038 00000779 1E                      		push	ds
 11039 0000077A 07                      		pop	es
 11040 0000077B B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 11041 0000077E CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 11042                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 11043                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 11044                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 11045 00000780 07                      		pop	es
 11046 00000781 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 11047                                  rd_rty:					
 11048 00000783 E86504                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 11049 00000786 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 11050 00000788 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11051                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11052                                  					; fnon_removable
 11053 0000078D 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 11054 0000078F 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11055 00000794 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 11056 00000796 50                      		push	ax
 11057 00000797 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 11058 00000798 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11059                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11060                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11061                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 11062                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11063 0000079C B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 11064 0000079E 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 11065                                  		; 
 11066 000007A1 1F                      		pop	ds
 11067 000007A2 A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 11068 000007A5 58                      		pop	ax
 11069                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 11070 000007A6 06                      		push	es
 11071 000007A7 1E                      		push	ds
 11072 000007A8 07                      		pop	es
 11073 000007A9 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 11074 000007AC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 11075                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 11076                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 11077                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 11078 000007AE 07                      		pop	es
 11079 000007AF 9C                      		pushf
 11080 000007B0 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11081 000007B5 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 11082 000007B7 50                      		push	ax
 11083 000007B8 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 11084 000007BB 1E                      		push	ds
 11085 000007BC C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11086 000007C0 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11087 000007C3 1F                      		pop	ds
 11088 000007C4 58                      		pop	ax
 11089                                  rd_skip2_dpt:				
 11090 000007C5 9D                      		popf
 11091 000007C6 7305                    		jnb	short okret2
 11092 000007C8 EBB9                    		jmp	short rd_rty
 11093                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11094                                  
 11095                                  err_rd_ret:				
 11096 000007CA B2FF                    		mov	dl, 0FFh	; make sure we ask rom if media	has changed
 11097                                  					; return error
 11098 000007CC F9                      		stc
 11099                                  
 11100                                  ; update information pertaining to last drive accessed, time of access, last
 11101                                  ; track accessed in that drive.
 11102                                  
 11103                                  okret2:					
 11104 000007CD 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl	; set up for head settle logic in disk
 11105 000007D1 8816[1E01]              		mov	[tim_drv], dl	; save drive last accessed
 11106 000007D5 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11107                                  					; save last track accessed on this drive
 11108                                  					; preserve flags in case error occurred
 11109 000007D9 9C                      		pushf
 11110 000007DA E8EE03                  		call	set_tim
 11111 000007DD 9D                      		popf			; restore flags
 11112 000007DE 5D                      		pop	bp
 11113 000007DF C3                      		retn
 11114                                  
 11115                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11116                                  ;	disk open/close routines
 11117                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11118                                  
 11119                                  dsk_open:				; 2C7h:80Ah = 70h:2D7Ah
 11120 000007E0 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 11121 000007E5 7407                    		jz	short dsk_open_exit ; done if no changeline support
 11122 000007E7 E8DCFC                  		call	SetDrive	; get bds for drive
 11123 000007EA 26FF4520                		inc	word [es:di+20h] ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 11124                                  dsk_open_exit:	
 11125                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11126                                  		; cf = 0			
 11127                                  		;clc		; CF is	already	ZERO here (18/09/2022, MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11128                                  				; (19/07/2019 -	Erdogan	Tan - MSDOS 6.0	IO.SYS - retrodos4.s)
 11129 000007EE C3                      		retn
 11130                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11131                                  
 11132                                  dsk_close:				; 2C7h:81Ah = 70h:2D8Ah
 11133 000007EF 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 11134 000007F4 740E                    		jz	short exitjx	; done if no changeline	support
 11135 000007F6 E8CDFC                  		call	SetDrive	; get bds for drive
 11136 000007F9 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 11137 000007FE 7404                    		jz	short exitjx	; watch	out for	wrap
 11138 00000800 26FF4D20                		dec	word [es:di+20h]
 11139                                  exitjx:					
 11140                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11141                                  		; cf = 0
 11142                                  		;clc		; CF is	already	ZERO here (18/09/2022, MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11143                                  				; (19/07/2019 -	Erdogan	Tan - MSDOS 6.0	IO.SYS - retrodos4.s)
 11144 00000804 C3                      		retn
 11145                                  
 11146                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11147                                  ;		disk removable routine
 11148                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11149                                  
 11150                                  		; al is	unit #
 11151                                  dsk_rem:				; 2C7h:831h = 70h:2DA1h
 11152 00000805 E8BEFC                  		call	SetDrive	; get bds for this drive
 11153                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 11154 00000808 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11155                                  		;jnz	short x_bus_exit ; non_rem
 11156 0000080D 7501                    		jnz	short non_rem	; 15/10/2022
 11157                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11158                                  		; cf = 0
 11159                                  		;clc			; CF is already ZERO here
 11160                                  					; 15/10/2022
 11161 0000080F C3                      		retn
 11162                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11163                                  
 11164                                  non_rem:
 11165                                  x_bus_exit:				
 11166 00000810 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; 2C7h:83Dh = 0070h:2DADh
 11167                                  					; return busy status
 11168 00000812 F9                      		stc
 11169                                  dsk_ret:				
 11170 00000813 C3                      		retn

 11219                                  checksingle:
 11220 0000082F 50                      		push	ax
 11221 00000830 53                      		push	bx
 11222 00000831 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11223                                  
 11224                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 11225                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 11226                                  
 11227 00000835 F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 11228 00000838 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 11229 0000083A F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 11230                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 11231 0000083D 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 11232                                  
 11233                                  
 11234                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 11235                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 11236                                  
 11237 0000083F 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11238                                  					; get physical drive number

 11240 00000844 57                      		push	di
 11241 00000845 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 11242                                  scan_list:
 11243 00000849 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 11244 0000084D 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 11245 0000084F B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 11246 00000851 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 11247 00000855 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 11248 00000857 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 11249 0000085B 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 11250 0000085C 07                      		pop	es
 11251 0000085D 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 11252                                  
 11253                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 11254                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 11255                                  ; in this case.

 11257 00000866 7517                    		jnz	short not_fsetowner
 11258                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
 11259 00000868 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 11260 0000086D 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 11261 0000086F 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 11262                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 11263                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 11264 00000873 06                      		push	es
 11265 00000874 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 11266 00000878 26A20405                		mov	[es:LSTDRV], al
 11267                                  		;mov	es:504h, al	; [es:LSTDRV]
 11268                                  					; set up sdsb

 11270 0000087D EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret
 11271                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11272                                  
 11273                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 11274                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 11275                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb
 11276                                  
 11277                                  not_fsetowner:

 11279 00000884 7517                    		jnz	short ignore_sdsb
 11280 00000886 50                      		push	ax
 11281 00000887 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; if (curr_drv == req_drv)
 11282 0000088B 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 11283 0000088D 06                      		push	es
 11284 0000088E 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 11285 00000892 2686060405              		xchg	al, [es:LSTDRV]

 11287                                  					; then swap(curr_drv,req_drv)

 11290 0000089A 58                      		pop	ax		; swap(curr_drv,req_drv)

 11297                                  scan_skip:

 11302 000008A8 759F                    		jnz	short scan_list	; ontinue until	hit end	of list
 11303 000008AA F9                      		stc

 11335                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11336                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 11337                                  ;
 11338                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 11339                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 11340                                  ;	cx = sector count
 11341                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 11342                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 11343                                  ;	ds = cs
 11344                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 11345                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 11346                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 11347                                  ;
 11348                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 11349                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 11350                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11351                                  
 11352                                  diskrd:
 11353                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread

 11357                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11358                                  
 11359                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11360                                  diskio:
 11361 000008B9 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 11362 000008BB 8C06[2E05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 11363 000008BF E804FC                  		call	SetDrive
 11364 000008C2 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 11365 000008C6 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 11366                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 11367 000008C9 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 11368                                  
 11369                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 11370                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 11371                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 11372                                  
 11373 000008CB 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2

 11375                                  					; unformatted_media
 11376 000008D0 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive

 11378 000008D6 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 11379                                  
 11380                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 11381                                  
 11382 000008DA 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11383 000008DC 31F6                    		xor	si, si

 11385                                  		;adc	si, 0
 11386                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 11387 000008E0 D1D6                    		rcl	si, 1

 11391                                  		;cmp	si, 0

 11394 000008EB 751A                    		jnz	short baddrive

 11396 000008F1 7714                    		ja	short baddrive
 11397 000008F3 EB16                    		jmp	short sanityok
 11398                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11399                                  
 11400                                  sanity32:
 11401 000008F5 0336[2405]              		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 11402 000008F9 263B751D                		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 11403 000008FD 720C                    		jb	short sanityok
 11404 000008FF 7706                    		ja	short baddrive

 11406                                  		;ja	short baddrive
 11407                                  		; 22/12/2023
 11408 00000905 7604                    		jna	short sanityok

 11413                                  baddrive:

 11415                                  		;jmp	short baddrive_ret

 11427                                  sanityok:

 11429 0000090F 26034517                		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 11430 00000913 26135519                		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 11431

 11433                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 11434                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 11435

 11438                                  		; [temp_h] = [saved_word]

 11441                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.

 11456 00000932 7510                    		jnz	short skip_setup
 11457 00000934 E8F8FE                  		call	checksingle
 11458                                  
 11459                                  ; check to see if we have previously noted a change line. the routine
 11460                                  ; returns if everything is ok. otherwise, it pops off the stack and returns
 11461                                  ; the proper error code.
 11462                                  
 11463 00000937 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 11464 0000093C 7403                    		jz	short diskio_nochangeline ; brif not
 11465 0000093E E8680E                  		call	checklatchio	; will do a sneaky pop stack return
 11466                                  					; if a disk error occurs
 11467                                  diskio_nochangeline:

 11469                                  
 11470                                  ; now the settle values are correct for the following code
 11471                                  
 11472                                  skip_setup:
 11473                                  
 11474                                  ; 32 bit sector calculation.
 11475                                  ; dx:[saved_word] = starting sector number.
 11476                                  
 11477 00000944 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11478 00000946 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx

 11503 00000965 A3[2205]                		mov	[temp_h], ax	; [temp_h] = [saved_word]

 11506 0000096B 833E[2205]00            		cmp	word [temp_h], 0

 11509 00000970 7795                    		ja	short baddrive

 11511                                  		;ja	short baddrive_brdg

 11513 00000977 8816[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dl	; save current head

 11515                                  
 11516                                  ; we are now set up for the i/o. normally, we consider the dma boundary
 11517                                  ; violations here. not true. we perform the operation as if everything is

 11574                                  
 11575                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11576                                  ; set the drive-last-accessed flag for diskette only.
 11577                                  ; we know that the hard disk will not be removed.
 11578                                  ; es:di -> current bds.
 11579                                  ; ds -> Bios_Data
 11580                                  ; ax,cx,si are destroyed.

 11582

 11584                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11585                                  iosetup:
 11586 000009BB 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11587 000009BF A2[1E01]                		mov	[tim_drv], al	; save drive letter
 11588

 11590

 11596 000009D1 884404                  		mov	[si+4],	al
 11597                                  		; 23/12/2023

 11601 000009D9 1F                      		pop	ds

 11604                                  
 11605                                  ; for 3.5" drives, both external as well as on the k09, we need to set the
 11606                                  ; motor start time to 4. this checking for every i/o is going to affect
 11607                                  ; performance across the board, but is necessary!!
 11608

 11616                                  motor_start_ok:

 12048                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12049                                  
 12050                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 12051                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 12052                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 12053                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count

 12060                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 12061 00000BF3 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 12062 00000BF4 C3                      		retn

 12065                                  dont_dec_retry_count:

 12078                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12079                                  ;
 12080                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 12081                                  ;
 12082                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 12083                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 12084                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 12085                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 12086                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 12087                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 12088                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 12089                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 12090                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12091                                  
 12092                                  		; generic ioctl dispatch tables
 12093                                  
 12094                                  ; BIOSCODE:0C3Ch (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12095                                  
 12096                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12097 00000BF8 00                      		db 0
 12098                                  
 12099                                  ; 09/12/2022 
 12100                                  %if 0
 12101                                  
 12102                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 12103                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 12104                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	; ReadTrack
 12105                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack
 12106                                  		dw 0CA3h	 	; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12107                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12108                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12109                                  		dw 119Ah	; 66h	; GetMediaId
 12110                                  		dw 1269h	; 67h	; GetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 12111                                  		dw 12C1h	; 68h	; SenseMediaType
 12112                                  
 12113                                  IoWriteJumpTable: db 7	; ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2
 12114                                  		dw 0CF3h	; 40h	; SetDeviceParameters
 12115                                  		dw 0EEFh	; 41h	; WriteTrack
 12116                                  		dw 0DC1h	; 42h	; FormatTrack
 12117                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12118                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12119                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 12120                                  		dw 11D2h	; 46h	; SetMediaId
 12121                                  		dw 1280h	; 47h	; SetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 12122                                  
 12123                                  %endif
 12124                                  
 12125                                  		; 09/12/2022
 12126 00000BF9 09                      IoReadJumpTable: db ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2 ; 8
 12127 00000BFA [640C]                  		dw GetDeviceParameters	; 60h
 12128 00000BFC [A60E]                  		dw ReadTrack		; 61h
 12129 00000BFE [460E]                  		dw VerifyTrack		; 62h
 12130 00000C00 [600C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 12131 00000C02 [600C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 12132 00000C04 [600C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 12133 00000C06 [2511]                  		dw GetMediaId		; 66h
 12134 00000C08 [EB11]                  		dw GetAccessFlag	; 67h ; unpublished function
 12135 00000C0A [3C12]                  		dw SenseMediaType	; 68h
 12136                                  
 12137 00000C0C 08                      IoWriteJumpTable: db ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2 ; 7
 12138 00000C0D [AF0C]                  		dw SetDeviceParameters	; 40h
 12139 00000C0F [AD0E]                  		dw WriteTrack		; 41h
 12140 00000C11 [820D]                  		dw FormatTrack		; 42h
 12141 00000C13 [600C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 12142 00000C15 [600C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 12143 00000C17 [600C]                  		dw Cmd_Error_Proc
 12144 00000C19 [5B11]                  		dw SetMediaId		; 46h
 12145 00000C1B [0012]                  		dw SetAccessFlag	; 47h ; unpublished function

 12147                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12148                                  ; IOC_DC_Table
 12149                                  ;
 12150                                  ; This table contains all of the valid generic IOCtl Minor codes for
 12151                                  ; major function 08 to be used by the Ioctl_Support_Query function.
 12152                                  ; Added for 5.00
 12153                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12154                                  
 12155 00000C1D 60                      IOC_DC_Table:	db 60h			; GET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS
 12156 00000C1E 40                      		db 40h			; SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS
 12157 00000C1F 61                      		db 61h			; READ_TRACK
 12158 00000C20 41                      		db 41h			; WRITE_TRACK
 12159 00000C21 62                      		db 62h			; VERIFY_TRACK
 12160 00000C22 42                      		db 42h			; FORMAT_TRACK
 12161 00000C23 66                      		db 66h			; GET_MEDIA_ID
 12162 00000C24 46                      		db 46h			; SET_MEDIA_ID
 12163 00000C25 67                      		db 67h			; GET_ACCESS_FLAG
 12164 00000C26 47                      		db 47h			; SET_ACCESS_FLAG
 12165 00000C27 68                      		db 68h			; SENSE_MEDIA_TYPE
 12166                                  
 12167                                  ;IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN EQU $ - IOC_DC_Table
 12168                                  
 12169                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12170                                  
 12171                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12172                                  
 12173                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12174                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 12175                                  ;
 12176                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 12177                                  ;
 12178                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 12179                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 12180                                  ;	subfunctions.
 12181                                  ;
 12182                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12183                                  
 12184                                  ; 11/03/2019
 12185                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12186                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 12187 00000C28 E89BF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 12188 00000C2B 06                      		push	es
 12189 00000C2C C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 12190 00000C30 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12191                                  					; RAWIO
 12192 00000C35 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 12193 00000C39 07                      		pop	es
 12194 00000C3A 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 12195                                  
 12196                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 12197                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 12198                                  
 12199                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12200 00000C3C BE[F90B]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 12201                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 12202                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 12203 00000C3F A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 12204 00000C41 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 12205                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12206 00000C43 BE[0C0C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 12207                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 12208                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 12209                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 12210 00000C46 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 12211 00000C48 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 12212 00000C4A 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 12213 00000C4D 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 12214 00000C4F 98                      		cbw
 12215 00000C50 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12216 00000C52 46                      		inc	si
 12217 00000C53 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12218 00000C55 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 12219                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 12220 00000C58 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12221                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12222                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 12223 00000C5D B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 12224 00000C5F C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 12225                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12226                                  
 12227                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 12228                                  		; as a fall through from above
 12229                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 12230 00000C60 5A                      		pop	dx
 12231                                  
 12232                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 12233 00000C61 E971F4                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12234                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12235                                  
 12236                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12237                                  
 12238                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12239                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 12240                                  ;
 12241                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 12242                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 12243                                  ;
 12244                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 12245                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 12246                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 12247                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 12248                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12249                                  
 12250                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12251                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 12252                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 12253                                  
 12254 00000C64 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12255 00000C68 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12256                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 12257 00000C6B 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12258 00000C6F 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 12259 00000C72 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12260 00000C76 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 12261                                  					; Mask off other bits
 12262 00000C79 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 12263 00000C7C 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12264 00000C80 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 12265 00000C83 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 12266 00000C85 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 12267                                  					
 12268                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 12269 00000C88 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 12270 00000C8B F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12271                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB
 12272 00000C8E 7412                    		jz	short UseBpbPresent
 12273 00000C90 1E                      		push	ds		; Save request packet segment
 12274 00000C91 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12275                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12276                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 12277                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data
 12278 00000C96 E896FB                  		call	checksingle
 12279 00000C99 E857F9                  		call	GetBp		; Build	the bpb	from scratch
 12280 00000C9C 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore request packet segment
 12281 00000C9D 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet
 12282 00000C9F 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec] = [di+BSD.DP_BPB]
 12283                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 12284                                  UseBpbPresent:				
 12285 00000CA2 8D7F07                  		lea	di, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 12286                                  					; This is where	the result goes
 12287 00000CA5 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 12288                                  					; For now use 'small' bpb
 12289 00000CA8 1E                      		push	ds		; reverse segments for copy
 12290 00000CA9 06                      		push	es
 12291 00000CAA 1F                      		pop	ds
 12292 00000CAB 07                      		pop	es
 12293 00000CAC F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12294                                  		
 12295                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12296                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction -above- resets cf) 	
 12297                                  		;clc
 12298                                  GetParmRet:				
 12299 00000CAE C3                      		retn
 12300                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12301                                  
 12302                                  ; 17/10/2022
 12303                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12304                                  
 12305                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12306                                  ; SetDeviceParameters:
 12307                                  ;
 12308                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12309                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12310                                  
 12311                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12312                                  SetDeviceParameters:			; 2C7h:0CF3h = 70h:3263h
 12313 00000CAF C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12314 00000CB3 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12315 00000CB6 26814D234001            		or	word [es:di+23h], 140h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12316                                  					; fchanged_by_format|fchanged
 12317 00000CBC F60702                  		test	byte [bx], 2	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12318                                  					; ONLY_SET_TRACKLAYOUT
 12319 00000CBF 7579                    		jnz	short setTrackTable
 12320 00000CC1 8A4701                  		mov	al, [bx+1]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 12321 00000CC4 26884522                		mov	[es:di+34], al	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12322 00000CC8 8B4704                  		mov	ax, [bx+4]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 12323 00000CCB 26894525                		mov	[es:di+37], ax	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12324 00000CCF 8B4702                  		mov	ax, [bx+2]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 12325 00000CD2 1E                      		push	ds
 12326                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12327 00000CD3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12328                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12329                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 12330                                  		;cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 12331 00000CD8 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 12332 00000CDD 1F                      		pop	ds
 12333 00000CDE 7502                    		jnz	short HaveChange ; we have changeline support
 12334                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12335 00000CE0 24FD                    		and	al, 0FDh
 12336                                  		;and	ax, 0FFFDh	; ~fchangeline
 12337                                  
 12338                                  		; Ignore all bits except non_removable and changeline
 12339                                  HaveChange:				
 12340 00000CE2 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable|fchangeline
 12341 00000CE5 268B4D23                		mov	cx, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12342 00000CE9 81E1F4FD                		and	cx, 0FDF4h	; ~(fnon_removable|fchangeline|good_tracklayout|unformatted_media)
 12343 00000CED 09C8                    		or	ax, cx
 12344 00000CEF 26894523                		mov	[es:di+35], ax	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12345 00000CF3 8A4706                  		mov	al, [bx+6]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 12346                                  					; Set media type
 12347 00000CF6 1E                      		push	ds
 12348 00000CF7 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12349                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12350 00000CFC A2[2E06]                		mov	[mediatype], al
 12351                                  		;mov	ds:mediatype, al
 12352 00000CFF 1F                      		pop	ds
 12353                                  
 12354                                  		; The media changed (maybe) so we will have to do a set dasd
 12355                                  		; the next time we format a track
 12356                                  
 12357                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12358 00000D00 26804D2380              		or	byte [es:di+35], 80h
 12359                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12360                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12361 00000D05 57                      		push	di		; Save bds pointer
 12362                                  
 12363                                  		; Figure out what we are supposed to do with the bpb
 12364                                  		; were we asked to install a fake bpb?
 12365                                  
 12366 00000D06 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12367                                  					; INSTALL_FAKE_BPB
 12368 00000D09 7514                    		jnz	short InstallFakeBpb
 12369                                  
 12370                                  		; were we returning a fake bpb when asked to build a bpb?
 12371                                  
 12372                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12373 00000D0B 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+35], 4
 12374                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12375                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12376 00000D10 7405                    		jz	short InstallRecommendedBpb
 12377                                  
 12378                                  		; we were returning a fake bpb but we can stop now
 12379                                  
 12380                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12381 00000D12 26806523FB              		and	byte [es:di+35], 0FBh
 12382                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FFFBh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12383                                  					; ~return_fake_bpb
 12384                                  InstallRecommendedBpb:			
 12385 00000D17 B91F00                  		mov	cx, 31		; A_BPB.size
 12386 00000D1A 8D7D27                  		lea	di, [di+27h]	; [di+BDS.R_BPB] = [di+BDS.rbytespersec]
 12387 00000D1D EB0B                    		jmp	short CopyTheBpb
 12388                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12389                                  
 12390                                  InstallFakeBpb:
 12391                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12392 00000D1F 26804D2304              		or	byte [es:di+35], 4				
 12393                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 4 ; byte [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12394                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12395 00000D24 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; A_BPB.size - 6
 12396                                  					; move 'smaller' bpb
 12397 00000D27 8D7D06                  		lea	di, [di+6]	; [es:di+BDS.BPB] = [es:di+BDS.bytespersec]
 12398                                  
 12399                                  CopyTheBpb:				
 12400 00000D2A 8D7707                  		lea	si, [bx+7]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB]
 12401 00000D2D F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12402 00000D2F 1E                      		push	ds		; Save packet segment
 12403                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12404 00000D30 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12405                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12406                                  					; Setup	for ds -> Bios_Data
 12407 00000D35 E8C503                  		call	RestoreOldDpt	; Restore the old Dpt from TempDpt
 12408 00000D38 1F                      		pop	ds		; Restore packet segment
 12409 00000D39 5F                      		pop	di		; Restore bds pointer
 12410                                  setTrackTable:				
 12411 00000D3A 8B4F26                  		mov	cx, [bx+38]
 12412 00000D3D 1E                      		push	ds
 12413 00000D3E 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12414 00000D43 890E[3005]              		mov	[sectorspertrack], cx
 12415 00000D47 1F                      		pop	ds
 12416                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12417 00000D48 26806523F7              		and	byte [es:di+35], 0F7h
 12418                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FFF7h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12419                                  					; ~good_tracklayout
 12420 00000D4D F60704                  		test	byte [bx], 4	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12421                                  					; TRACKLAYOUT_IS_GOOD
 12422 00000D50 7405                    		jz	short UglyTrackLayOut
 12423                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12424 00000D52 26804D2308              		or	byte [es:di+35], 8
 12425                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12426                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12427                                  UglyTrackLayOut:			
 12428 00000D57 83F93F                  		cmp	cx, 63		; MAX_SECTORS_IN_TRACK
 12429 00000D5A 7722                    		ja	short TooManyPerTrack
 12430                                  		;jcxz	short SectorInfoSaved
 12431 00000D5C E31E                    		jcxz	SectorInfoSaved	; 19/10/2022
 12432 00000D5E BF[3205]                		mov	di, tracktable
 12433 00000D61 8D7728                  		lea	si, [bx+40]	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SECTORTABLE]
 12434                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12435 00000D64 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12436                                  		;mov	es, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12437                                  					; Trash	our bds	pointer
 12438                                  StoreSectorInfo:			
 12439 00000D69 47                      		inc	di
 12440 00000D6A 47                      		inc	di		; Skip over cylinder and head
 12441 00000D6B AD                      		lodsw			; Get sector id
 12442 00000D6C AA                      		stosb			; Copy it
 12443 00000D6D AD                      		lodsw			; Get sector size
 12444                                  
 12445                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 12446                                  		;call	SectSizeToSectIndex
 12447 00000D6E 80FC03                  		cmp	ah, 3 ; 02/09/2023
 12448                                  		;cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 12449                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 12450 00000D71 7704                    		ja	short OneK
 12451 00000D73 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 12452 00000D75 EB02                    		jmp	short sdp_s
 12453                                  OneK:
 12454 00000D77 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12455                                  sdp_s:
 12456 00000D79 AA                      		stosb			; Store	sector SIZE index
 12457 00000D7A E2ED                    		loop	StoreSectorInfo
 12458                                  SectorInfoSaved:
 12459 00000D7C F8                      		clc
 12460 00000D7D C3                      		retn
 12461                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12462                                  
 12463                                  TooManyPerTrack:

 12465 00000D80 F9                      		stc
 12466 00000D81 C3                      		retn

 12472                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12473                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12474                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12475                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12476                                  ;
 12477                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12478                                  ;
 12479                                  ; output:
 12480                                  ;	for status call:
 12481                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12482                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12483                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12484                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12485                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12486                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12487                                  ;
 12488                                  ;	for format track:
 12489                                  ;		carry set if error
 12490                                  ;
 12491                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12492                                  
 12493                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12494                                  
 12495                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12496                                  FormatTrack:
 12497 00000D82 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]

 12500                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT

 12542                                  					; about	the illegal combination)

 12645                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12646                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12647                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12648                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12649                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12650                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12651                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 12652                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 12653                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay

 12655                                  		; register.
 12656

 12758                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12759                                  
 12760                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12761                                  
 12762                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12763                                  ;
 12764                                  ; TrackIo:
 12765                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12766                                  ;
 12767                                  ;   input:
 12768                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12769                                  ;		  3 = write
 12770                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12771                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12772                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12773                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12774                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12775                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12776                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12777                                  ;
 12778                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12779                                  
 12780                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12781                                  		
 12782                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12783                                  TrackIo:	
 12784                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12785 00000EDA 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12786 00000EDE E84EF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12787 00000EE1 803E[2F06]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12788                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12789 00000EE6 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12790 00000EE8 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12791 00000EE9 51                      		push	cx
 12792 00000EEA E8CEFA                  		call	iosetup
 12793 00000EED 59                      		pop	cx
 12794 00000EEE 58                      		pop	ax
 12795                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the

 12798 00000EF4 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12799 00000EF6 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12800                                  
 12801                                  		; WE WANT:
 12802                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12803                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12804                                  		
 12805 00000EF8 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12806                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12807 00000EFB 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8

 12809                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12810 00000F00 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 12811

 12813                                  ionextsector:

 12815 00000F05 52                      		push	dx
 12816 00000F06 46                      		inc	si

 12818                                  					; the track table
