 12820 00000F09 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 12821                                  
 12822                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12823                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12824                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12825                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12826                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 12827                                  		
 12828                                  		; 12/12/2022

 12836                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12837 00000F18 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12838 00000F1A 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12839 00000F1E 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12840 00000F20 E81CFB                  		call	Disk
 12841 00000F23 5A                      		pop	dx
 12842 00000F24 59                      		pop	cx
 12843 00000F25 F8                      		clc
 12844 00000F26 C3                      		retn
 12845                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12846                                  
 12847                                  IoRemovable:				
 12848 00000F27 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 12849                                  					; table	and save it

 12853 00000F2B 50                      		push	ax

 12874 00000F49 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 12875

 12877 00000F4D 5A                      		pop	dx

 12885                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 12886                                  NoNeedDone:

 12890                                  
 12891                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12892                                  
 12893                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12894                                  ;
 12895                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12896                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12897                                  ; are permissible.
 12898                                  ;
 12899                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12900                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12901                                  ; All other registers preserved
 12902                                  ;
 12903                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12904                                  
 12905                                  ; 02/09/2023
 12906                                  ;SectSizeToSectIndex:
 12907                                  ;		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 12908                                  ;					; examine upper	byte only
 12909                                  ;		ja	short OneK
 12910                                  ;		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 12911                                  ;		retn
 12912                                  
 12913                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12914                                  ;
 12915                                  ;OneK:
 12916                                  ;		mov	al, 3
 12917                                  ;		retn
 12918

 12951                                  					; set_dasd_true

 12956                                  					; ~set_dasd_true

 12960 00000F7A B004                    		mov	al, 4

 12963 00000F80 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2

 12999                                  
 13000 00000F9F C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 13001                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)

 13011                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 13012                                  DasdHasBeenSet:

 13017                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13018                                  
 13019                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13020                                  
 13021                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13022                                  ;
 13023                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 13024                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 13025                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 13026                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 13027                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 13028                                  ;
 13029                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 13030                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 13031                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 13032                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 13033                                  ;
 13034                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 13035                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 13036                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 13037                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 13038                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 13039                                  ;
 13040                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13041                                  
 13042                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13043                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 13044 00000FBA 51                      		push	cx
 13045 00000FBB 52                      		push	dx
 13046                                  
 13047                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 13048                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 13049                                  
 13050 00000FBC 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13051 00000FC1 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 13052 00000FC3 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 13053 00000FC5 803E[2F06]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13054 00000FCA 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 13055 00000FCC EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 13056                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13057                                  
 13058                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 13059 00000FCE 06                      		push	es
 13060 00000FCF 56                      		push	si
 13061                                  
 13062                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13063                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 13064 00000FD0 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 13065 00000FD2 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 13066                                  
 13067 00000FD4 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13068                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 13069                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 13070 00000FD9 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 13071 00000FDD 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 13072                                  
 13073                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 13074                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 13075                                  
 13076 00000FE1 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13077 00000FE6 5E                      		pop	si
 13078 00000FE7 07                      		pop	es
 13079                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 13080 00000FE8 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 13081 00000FEC 49                      		dec	cx
 13082 00000FED 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 13083 00000FF0 D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 13084 00000FF2 D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 13085 00000FF4 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 13086 00000FF6 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13087 00000FFA 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13088 00000FFE 06                      		push	es
 13089 00000FFF 1E                      		push	ds
 13090 00001000 56                      		push	si
 13091 00001001 57                      		push	di
 13092 00001002 B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 13093 00001004 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 13094                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 13095 00001006 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 13096 00001008 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13097 0000100D 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 13098 0000100F 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 13099                                  		
 13100                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13101                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 13102 00001010 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 13103 00001012 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 13104 00001014 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 13105                                  
 13106 00001015 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13107                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 13108                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 13109 0000101A 8936[3106]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 13110 0000101E 8C06[3306]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 13111                                  
 13112                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13113                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 13114                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 13115                                  		;mov	es, si
 13116 00001022 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 13117                                  
 13118                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 13119 00001023 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 13120                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 13121 00001028 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 13122 0000102D C606[2F06]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13123                                  skip_disk_base_setting:			
 13124 00001032 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 13125                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 13126 00001034 A2[3006]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 13127 00001037 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 13128                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13129                                  
 13130                                  FormaStatErr:
 13131                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13132 00001039 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 13133                                  				
 13134 0000103B 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 13135                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 13136 0000103E 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 13137 00001040 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 13138 00001043 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 13139                                  		; 10/12/2022

 13141                                  		; 18/12/2022

 13155                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 13156                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13157                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet

 13159

 13161                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13162                                  		; al = 3
 13163                                  		;mov	al, 3		; Function supported, but
 13164                                  					; Media	not present.

 13175                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13176                                  
 13177                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13178                                  
 13179                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13180                                  ;
 13181                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 13182                                  ;
 13183                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 13184                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 13185                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 13186                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 13187                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 13188                                  ;
 13189                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13190                                  
 13191                                  ResetDisk:
 13192 0000104E 50                      		push	ax
 13193                                  
 13194                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13195 0000104F B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 13196 00001052 3806[2F06]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 13197                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13198                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 13199 00001056 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 13200                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 13201                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 13202 00001058 A2[3006]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 13203                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 13204                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 13205                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 13206 0000105B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 13207                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 13208 0000105D C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 13209                                  					; Zap up the speed
 13210 00001062 58                      		pop	ax
 13211 00001063 C3                      		retn

 13213                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13214                                  
 13215                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13216                                  
 13217                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13218                                  ;
 13219                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 13220                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 13221                                  ;
 13222                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 13223                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 13224                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 13225                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 13226                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 13227                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 13228                                  ;
 13229                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 13230                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 13231                                  ;
 13232                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13233                                  
 13234                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13235                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13236                                  ToRom:	
 13237 00001064 53                      		push	bx
 13238 00001065 56                      		push	si
 13239                                  
 13240                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 13241                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 13242                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 13243                                  
 13244 00001066 F606[2F06]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13245 0000106B 7534                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 13246 0000106D 50                      		push	ax
 13247 0000106E 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 13248 0000106F 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 13249                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 13250                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13251                                  		;pushf	; not necessary	; (Save	the cmp	result)
 13252                                  		
 13253 00001074 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 13254                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 13255 00001078 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13256                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 13257                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	Save pointer to table
 13258 0000107D 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 13259 00001081 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 13260                                  		
 13261 00001085 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 13262 00001088 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 13263 0000108C A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 13264 0000108F 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 13265                                  					; Important for	format
 13266 00001093 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 13267                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 13268                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 13269                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13270                                  		;popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 13271 00001098 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 13272 0000109A 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 13273                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 13274 0000109F 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 13275 000010A0 58                      		pop	ax
 13276                                  GotValidDpt:				
 13277 000010A1 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 13278 000010A5 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 13279 000010A7 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 13280 000010AB 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 13281 000010AF 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 13282 000010B0 8E06[2E05]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 13283 000010B4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 13284 000010B6 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 13285 000010B7 5E                      		pop	si
 13286 000010B8 5B                      		pop	bx
 13287 000010B9 C3                      		retn
 13288                                  
 13289                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13290                                  
 13291                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13292                                  
 13293                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13294                                  
 13295                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13296                                  ;
 13297                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13298                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13299                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13300                                  ;
 13301                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13302                                  
 13303                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13304                                  ioctl_getown:
 13305 000010BA E809F4                  		call	SetDrive
 13306 000010BD 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13307                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13308 000010C1 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13309                                  ownloop:				
 13310 000010C5 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13311 000010C9 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13312                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13313 000010CB 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13314                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13315                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13316 000010D0 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13317                                  getnextBDS:				
 13318 000010D2 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13319 000010D5 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13320                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13321                                  
 13322                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13323                                  ;
 13324                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13325                                  ; in al to al.
 13326                                  ;
 13327                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13328                                  
 13329                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13330                                  ioctl_setown:
 13331 000010D7 E8ECF3                  		call	SetDrive
 13332 000010DA C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13333                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13334 000010DF E84DF7                  		call	checksingle
 13335                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13336 000010E2 FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13337                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13338                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13339                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13340                                  
 13341                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13342                                  ;
 13343                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13344                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13345                                  ;
 13346                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13347                                  
 13348                                  exitown:				
 13349 000010E6 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 13350                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13351 000010E8 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 13352                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13353                                  					; fi_am_mult
 13354 000010ED 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 13355 000010EF 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13356                                  					; Get logical drive number
 13357                                  					; Get it 1-based
 13358 000010F3 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 13359                                  exitnomult:				
 13360 000010F5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 13361 000010F9 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 13362                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13363                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13364                                  		; cf=0
 13365                                  		;clc
 13366 000010FC C3                      		retn
 13367                                  
 13368                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13369                                  
 13370                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13371                                  
 13372                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13373                                  ;
 13374                                  ; moves the old Dpt that had been saved in TempDpt back to Dpt. this is done
 13375                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.
 13376                                  ; all registers (including flags) are preserved.
 13377                                  ;
 13378                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13379                                  
 13380                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13381                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13382                                  RestoreOldDpt:
 13383                                  		; if we have already restored the disk base table earlier,
 13384                                  		; do not do it again.

 13392 0000110B 56                      		push	si
 13393 0000110C 1E                      		push	ds
 13394 0000110D 06                      		push	es

 13401                                  		;;mov	es, es:zeroseg	; CAS -- bleeeech!

 13425                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13426                                  ;	get media id
 13427                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13428                                  ;
 13429                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13430                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13431                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13432                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13433                                  ;
 13434                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13435                                  ;
 13436                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13437                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13438                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13439                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13440                                  ;
 13441                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13442                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13443                                  ;
 13444                                  ; LOGIC:
 13445                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13446                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13447                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13448                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13449                                  ;
 13450                                  ; {
 13451                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13452                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13453                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13454                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13455                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13456                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13457                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13458                                  ;		};
 13459                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13460                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13461                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13462                                  ;		};
 13463                                  ;	else
 13464                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13465                                  ;
 13466                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13467                                  
 13468                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13469                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13470                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13471                                  
 13472                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13473                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13474                                  GetMediaId:
 13475 00001125 E89900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13476 00001128 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13477 0000112C C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13478 00001131 E87500                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13479 00001134 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13480                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13481 00001136 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13482                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13483                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13484                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13485 0000113B 721B                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	
 13486                                  
 13487                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13488 0000113D BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13489 00001140 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13490                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13491                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13492 00001143 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13493 00001145 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13494 00001149 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13495                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13496 0000114D 46                      		inc	si
 13497                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13498                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13499 0000114E 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13500                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 13501 00001151 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13502                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13503                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13504 00001154 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13505                                  	
 13506                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13507                                  		; cf = 0
 13508                                  		;clc
 13509                                  
 13510 00001156 C3                      		retn
 13511                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13512                                  
 13513                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13514                                  IOCtl_If2:
 13515 00001157 F9                      		stc	
 13516                                  IOCtl_If7:
 13517 00001158 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13518                                  		;stc
 13519                                  IOCtl_If6:
 13520                                  IOCtl_If1:
 13521 0000115A C3                      		retn

 13523

 13526                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13527                                  ;  set media id
 13528                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13529                                  
 13530                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13531                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13532                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13533                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13534                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13535                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13536                                  ;
 13537                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13538                                  ;
 13539                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13540                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13541                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13542                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13543                                  ;
 13544                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13545                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13546                                  ;
 13547                                  ; logic:
 13548                                  ;
 13549                                  ; {
 13550                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13551                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13552                                  ;	BootIo;
 13553                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13554                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13555                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13556                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13557                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13558                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13559                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13560                                  ;		};
 13561                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13562                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13563                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13564                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13565                                  ;		};
 13566                                  ;	else
 13567                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13568                                  ;
 13569                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13570                                  
 13571                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13572                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13573                                  SetMediaId:
 13574 0000115B E86300                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13575 0000115E 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13576                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13577 00001162 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13578 00001164 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13579 00001169 52                      		push	dx
 13580 0000116A E83C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13581 0000116D 5A                      		pop	dx
 13582 0000116E 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13583                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13584 00001170 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13585                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13586 00001175 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13587                                  		
 13588 00001177 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13589                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13590                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13591                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13592 0000117C 75D9                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2
 13593                                  
 13594 0000117E 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13595 0000117F 57                      		push	di
 13596 00001180 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13597 00001181 07                      		pop	es
 13598 00001182 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13599 00001185 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13600 00001189 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13601 0000118C 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13602                                  
 13603                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13604                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13605                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13606                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13607                                  		;rep movsb
 13608 0000118F E8BFFF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 13609                                  
 13610 00001192 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13611 00001193 1F                      		pop	ds
 13612 00001194 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13613 00001195 07                      		pop	es
 13614 00001196 E892F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13615 00001199 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13616 0000119B C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13617 000011A0 E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13618 000011A3 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13619                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13620                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 13621 000011A8 C3                      		retn
 13622                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13623                                  
 13624                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13625                                  ;IOCtl_If7:
 13626                                  ;		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13627                                  ;		stc
 13628                                  ;IOCtl_If6:
 13629                                  ;		retn

 13631                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13632                                  
 13633                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13634                                  
 13635                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13636                                  ;	BootIo
 13637                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13638                                  ;
 13639                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13640                                  ;
 13641                                  ; input :
 13642                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13643                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13644                                  ;
 13645                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13646                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13647                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13648                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13649                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13650                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13651                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13652                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13653                                  ;
 13654                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13655                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13656                                  ;
 13657                                  ; logic:
 13658                                  ;
 13659                                  ; {
 13660                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13661                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13662                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13663                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13664                                  ; }
 13665                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13666                                  
 13667                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13668                                  BootIo:	
 13669 000011A9 06                      		push	es
 13670 000011AA 57                      		push	di
 13671 000011AB 53                      		push	bx
 13672 000011AC 1E                      		push	ds
 13673 000011AD 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13674                                  
 13675                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13676                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13677                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13678                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13679                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13680                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13681                                  
 13682 000011AE BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13683 000011B1 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13684 000011B3 8916[2405]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13685 000011B7 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13686 000011BA E8FCF6                  		call	diskio
 13687 000011BD 5B                      		pop	bx
 13688 000011BE 5F                      		pop	di
 13689 000011BF 07                      		pop	es
 13690 000011C0 C3                      		retn
 13691                                  
 13692                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13693                                  
 13694                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13695                                  
 13696                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13697                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13698                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13699                                  ;
 13700                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13701                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13702                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13703                                  ; history in the flags.
 13704                                  ;
 13705                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13706                                  ;
 13707                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13708                                  ;
 13709                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13710                                  ;
 13711                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13712                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13713                                  ;
 13714                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13715                                  
 13716                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13717 000011C1 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13718 000011C5 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13719 000011C7 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13720                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13721 000011C9 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13722                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13723                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13724 000011CE 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13725 000011D0 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13726 000011D5 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13727 000011D7 E8DD06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13728 000011DA 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13729                                  
 13730                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13731                                  
 13732 000011DC B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13733 000011DE CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13734                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13735                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13736 000011E0 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13737 000011E2 53                      		push	bx
 13738 000011E3 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13739                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13740                                  					; physical drive
 13741 000011E6 E8A706                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13742 000011E9 5B                      		pop	bx
 13743                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13744 000011EA C3                      		retn
 13745                                  
 13746                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13747                                  
 13748                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13749                                  
 13750                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13751                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13752                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13753                                  ;
 13754                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13755                                  ;
 13756                                  ; INPUT :
 13757                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13758                                  ;
 13759                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13760                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13761                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13762                                  
 13763                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13764                                  GetAccessFlag:
 13765 000011EB C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13766 000011EF C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13767                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13768                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13769 000011F2 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13770                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13771 000011F4 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13772                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13773                                  					; unformatted_media
 13774 000011F9 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13775                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13776                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13777 000011FB 40                      		inc	ax
 13778                                  GafDone:
 13779 000011FC 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13780 000011FF C3                      		retn
 13781                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13782                                  
 13783                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13784                                  
 13785                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13786                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13787                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13788                                  ;
 13789                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13790                                  ;
 13791                                  ; input :
 13792                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13793                                  ;
 13794                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13795                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13796                                  
 13797                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13798                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13799 00001200 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13800 00001204 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13801                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13802 00001207 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13803                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13804                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13805 0000120C 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13806 00001210 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13807                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13808 00001212 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13809                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13810                                  					; unformatted_media
 13811                                  saf_Done:				
 13812 00001217 C3                      		retn
 13813                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13814                                  
 13815                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13816                                  
 13817                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13818                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13819                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13820                                  ;
 13821                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13822                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13823                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13824                                  ;
 13825                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13826                                  
 13827                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13828                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13829 00001218 06                      		push	es
 13830 00001219 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13831 0000121D 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13832                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13833 00001221 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13834                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13835 00001223 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13836 00001225 0E                      		push	cs
 13837 00001226 07                      		pop	es
 13838 00001227 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13839                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13840 0000122A BF[1D0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13841                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13842                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13843 0000122D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13844 0000122F F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13845 00001231 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13846 00001233 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13847                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13848                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13849                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13850                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13851                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13852                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13853                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 13854 00001236 07                      		pop	es
 13855                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13856                                  		; cf = 0
 13857                                  		;clc
 13858 00001237 C3                      		retn
 13859                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13860                                  nosupport:				
 13861 00001238 07                      		pop	es
 13862 00001239 E999EE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 13863                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13864                                  
 13865                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13866                                  
 13867                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13868                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13869                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13870                                  ;
 13871                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13872                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13873                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13874                                  ;	    drive)
 13875                                  ;
 13876                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13877                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13878                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13879                                  ;
 13880                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13881                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13882                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13883                                  ;
 13884                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13885                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13886                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13887                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13888                                  ;
 13889                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13890                                  ;
 13891                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13892                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13893                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13894                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13895                                  ; 
 13896                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13897                                  
 13898                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13899                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13900 0000123C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13901 00001240 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13902                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13903                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13904 00001243 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13905 00001245 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13906                                  		;
 13907 00001247 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13908                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13909                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13910                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13911 0000124B B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13912                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13913 0000124D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13914 0000124F 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13915 00001251 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13916                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13917 00001253 FEC8                    		dec	al
 13918 00001255 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13919 00001257 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13920 00001259 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13921 0000125B 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13922 0000125D 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13923 0000125F 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13924 00001261 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13925                                  GotMediaType:				
 13926 00001263 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13927                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13928                                  		; cf = 0
 13929                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13930 00001266 C3                      		retn
 13931                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13932                                  
 13933                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13934 00001267 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13935 0000126A 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13936 0000126C B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13937 0000126E 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13938 00001271 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13939                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13940 00001273 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13941                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13942 00001275 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13943 00001277 F9                      		stc
 13944 00001278 C3                      		retn
 13945                                  
 13946                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13947                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13948                                  		;db    0
 13949                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13950                                  
 13951                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13952                                  
 13953                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13954                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13955                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13956                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13957                                  
 13958                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13959                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13960                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13961                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13962                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13963                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13964                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13965                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13966                                  ;
 13967                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13968                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13969                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13970                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13971                                  ;
 13972                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13973                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13974                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13975                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13976                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13977                                  ;
 13978                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13979                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13980                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13981                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13982                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13983                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13984                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13985                                  
 13986                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13987                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13988                                  
 13989                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13990                                  
 13991                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13992 00001279 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13993 0000127C 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13994 0000127E 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13995 00001281 7431                    		jz	short mine
 13996                                  
 13997                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13998                                  
 13999 00001283 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 14000 00001286 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 14001 00001288 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 14002 0000128B 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 14003 0000128D E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 14004                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14005                                  
 14006                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 14007 00001290 CF                      		iret
 14008                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14009

 14017                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14018                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 14019                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 14020                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 14021                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 14022                                  		
 14023                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14024                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 14025 00001299 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 14026                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 14027 0000129D FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 14028                                  
 14029                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 14030                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 14031                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 14032                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 14033                                  		
 14034                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 14035                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14036 000012A1 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 14037 000012A5 A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 14038                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 14039                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14040 000012A8 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 14041 000012AC 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 14042                                  
 14043 000012B0 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 14044                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14045                                  		;pop	bx

 14047                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 14048 000012B2 58                      		pop	ax
 14049                                  i2f_iret:
 14050 000012B3 CF                      		iret

 14125                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 14126                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 14127                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.

 14129                                  win386call:				
 14130 000012F4 1E                      		push	ds
 14131 000012F5 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 14132                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 14133                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h

 14135                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?

 14137 000012FE 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 14138                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 14139 00001300 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 14140                                  		; 12/12/2022

 14143 00001305 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 14144                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present

 14172                                  handle_multmult:

 14177                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14178                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 14179                                  		;dec	bx
 14180 0000132F BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 14181 00001332 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 14182 00001334 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 14183 00001336 F7D3                    		not	bx
 14184 00001338 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 14185 0000133A 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 14186 0000133C 43                      		inc	bx
