 15299                                  
 15300                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 15301 0000171D 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15302 0000171F 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15302 00001728 736B6574746520666F-
 15302 00001731 7220647269766520   
 15303                                  
 15304                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15305 00001739 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15305 00001742 65737320616E79206B-
 15305 0000174B 6579207768656E2072-
 15305 00001754 656164790D0A       
 15306 0000175A 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15307                                  
 15308                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15309                                  
 15310                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15311                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15312                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15313                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15314                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15315                                  
 15316                                  chkopcnt:		
 15317 0000175C 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15318 00001761 C3                      		retn
 15319                                  
 15320                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15321                                  
 15322                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15323                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15324                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15325                                  ;
 15326                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15327                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15328                                  
 15329                                  mediacheck:	
 15330 00001762 E8CAF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15331 00001765 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15332 00001767 E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15333 0000176A 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15334 0000176C E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15335 0000176F 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15336 00001771 50                      		push	ax
 15337 00001772 52                      		push	dx
 15338 00001773 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15339                                  					; set logical drive number
 15340 00001777 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15341 00001779 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15342                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15343                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15344 0000177B 5A                      		pop	dx
 15345 0000177C 58                      		pop	ax
 15346 0000177D 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15347 0000177F BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15348                                  
 15349                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15350                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15351                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15352                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15353                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15354                                  ; status.
 15355                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15356 00001782 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15357 00001786 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15358                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15359                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15360                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15361                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15362 0000178A 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15363                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15364                                  
 15365                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15366                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15367                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15368                                  
 15369 0000178C 50                      		push	ax
 15370 0000178D 51                      		push	cx
 15371 0000178E 52                      		push	dx
 15372 0000178F E8BCED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15373 00001792 5A                      		pop	dx
 15374 00001793 59                      		pop	cx
 15375 00001794 58                      		pop	ax
 15376 00001795 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15377 00001797 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15378                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15379 00001799 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15380                                  mediaret:				
 15381 0000179B C3                      		retn
 15382                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15383                                  
 15384                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15385                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15386                                  ; or write.
 15387                                  
 15388                                  mediadovolid:				
 15389 0000179C E854EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15390 0000179F 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15391 000017A1 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15392 000017A4 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15393 000017A6 E90AF4                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15394                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15395                                  
 15396                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15397                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15398                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15399                                  ; dos.
 15400                                  ;
 15401                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15402                                  
 15403                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15404                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15405                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15406                                  
 15407                                  checklatchio:	
 15408                                  
 15409                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15410                                  			
 15411 000017A9 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15412 000017AC 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15413                                  
 15414                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15415                                  
 15416 000017AE E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15417 000017B1 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15418                                  
 15419                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15420                                  ; expensive verification.
 15421                                  
 15422 000017B3 E83DEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15423 000017B6 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15424 000017B8 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15425 000017BB 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15426 000017BD 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15427 000017BF 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15428 000017C1 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15429                                  checklatchret:				
 15430 000017C4 E8ECF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15431                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15432 000017C7 F9                      		stc
 15433 000017C8 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15434                                  checkret:				
 15435 000017C9 C3                      		retn
 15436                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15437                                  
 15438                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15439                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15440                                  ;
 15441                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15442                                  
 15443                                  checkfatvid:				
 15444 000017CA E8BC01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15445 000017CD 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15446 000017CF 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15447                                  
 15448                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15449                                  
 15450                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15451                                  
 15452                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15453                                  
 15454                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15455                                  ;
 15456                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15457                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15458                                  ;
 15459                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15460                                  ;
 15461                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15462                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15463                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15464                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15465                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15466                                  ;
 15467                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15468                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15469                                  ; routine.)
 15470                                  ;
 15471                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15472                                  
 15473                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15474                                  check_vid:
 15475                                  
 15476                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15477                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15478                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15479                                  
 15480 000017D1 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15481                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15482                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15483 000017D6 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15484 000017D8 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15485 000017DB 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15486 000017DD 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15487 000017DF 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15488                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15489 000017E4 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15490                                  					; if not fat system
 15491 000017E6 E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15492 000017E9 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15493 000017EB E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15494 000017EE BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15495                                  					; definitely changed
 15496 000017F1 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15497                                  
 15498 000017F3 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15499                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15500 000017F4 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15501                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15502                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15503                                  		;clc
 15504                                  checkfatret:				
 15505 000017F7 C3                      		retn
 15506                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15507                                  
 15508                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15509                                  changed_drv:
 15510 000017F8 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15511 000017F9 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15512                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15513 000017FE C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15514                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15515                                  
 15516                                  ; extended id check
 15517                                  
 15518                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15519                                  
 15520                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15521                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15522                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15523                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15524                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15525                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15526                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15527                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15528                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15529                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15530                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15531                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15532                                  ;
 15533                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15534                                  
 15535                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15536                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 15537 000017FF 50                      		push	ax
 15538                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15539                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15540 00001800 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15541                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15542 00001803 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15543 00001805 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15544 00001809 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15545 0000180B A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15546 0000180E 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15547 00001812 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15548                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15549                                  					; don't know
 15550 00001814 58                      		pop	ax
 15551 00001815 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15552                                  					; reset the flag
 15553                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15554                                  
 15555                                  ext_changed:
 15556 00001817 58                      		pop	ax
 15557                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15558 00001818 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15559                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15560                                  					; disk changed!
 15561                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15562                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15563                                  		;clc
 15564 00001819 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15565                                  
 15566                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15567                                  
 15568                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15569                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15570                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15571                                  ;
 15572                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15573                                  
 15574                                  checkio:				
 15575 0000181B 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15576 0000181E 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15577 00001820 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15578 00001823 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15579 00001825 E8CBED                  		call	GetBp
 15580 00001828 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15581 0000182A E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15582 0000182D 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15583 0000182F 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15584 00001831 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15585 00001833 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15586 00001834 C3                      		retn
 15587                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15588                                  
 15589                                  checkioerr:				
 15590 00001835 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15591                                  
 15592                                  checkioret:				
 15593 00001838 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15594 00001839 E928F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15595                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15596                                  
 15597                                  no_error_map:				
 15598 0000183C E928F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15599                                  
 15600                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15601                                  
 15602                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15603                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15604                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15605                                  
 15606                                  returnvid:		
 15607 0000183F BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15608                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15609 00001842 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15610 00001845 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15611 00001847 F9                      		stc
 15612 00001848 C3                      		retn
 15613                                  
 15614                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15615                                  
 15616                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15617                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15618                                  ;
 15619                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15620                                  ; **trashes si**
 15621                                  
 15622                                  media_set_vid:				
 15623 00001849 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15624                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15625                                  
 15626                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15627                                  
 15628                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15629                                  
 15630                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15631                                  
 15632                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15633                                  vid_into_packet:
 15634 0000184C 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15635 0000184D C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15636 00001851 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15637 00001854 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15638 00001856 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15639 00001859 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15640 0000185C 1F                      		pop	ds
 15641                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15642 0000185D C3                      		retn
 15643                                  
 15644                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15645                                  
 15646                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15647                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15648                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15649                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15650                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15651                                  ;
 15652                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15653                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15654                                  ;
 15655                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15656                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15657                                  ;		carry set
 15658                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15659                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15660                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15661                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15662                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15663                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15664                                  ;
 15665                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15666                                  
 15667                                  hidensity:
 15668                                  
 15669                                  ; check for correct drive
 15670                                  		
 15671                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15672 0000185E 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15673                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15674                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15675 00001863 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15676                                  
 15677                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15678                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15679                                  
 15680 00001865 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15681 0000186A 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15682                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15683                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15684 0000186C 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15685 0000186F 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15686                                  
 15687                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15688                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15689                                  
 15690                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15691 00001871 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15692 00001875 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15693                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15694                                  					; ffOther
 15695 00001877 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15696 00001879 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15697                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15698                                  					; ff288
 15699 0000187B 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15700 0000187D B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15701 0000187F BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15702                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15703                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15704 00001882 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15705                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15706                                  					; 2 sides
 15707                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15708 00001885 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15709 00001886 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15710                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15711                                  					; & head max
 15712                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15713 00001889 E9D3ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15714                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15715                                  
 15716                                  Is720K:
 15717                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15718 0000188C 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15719                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15720 0000188D E999ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15721                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15722                                  
 15723                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15724                                  ;dofloppy:
 15725                                  		;retn
 15726                                  
 15727                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15728                                  
 15729                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15730                                  
 15731                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15732                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15733                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15734                                  ;
 15735                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15736                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15737                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15738                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15739                                  ;
 15740                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15741                                  ;
 15742                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15743                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15744                                  
 15745                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15746 00001890 06                      		push	es
 15747 00001891 57                      		push	di
 15748                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15749                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15750 00001892 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15751                                  
 15752                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15753                                  
 15754                                  scan_bds:				
 15755 00001896 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15756 0000189A 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15757                                  
 15758                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15759                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15760                                  
 15761 0000189C 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15762                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15763                                  get_next_bds:				
 15764 000018A0 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15765                                  					; go to	next bds
 15766 000018A3 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15767 000018A6 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15768 000018A8 5F                      		pop	di
 15769 000018A9 07                      		pop	es
 15770 000018AA C3                      		retn
 15771                                  
 15772                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15773                                  
 15774                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15775                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15776                                  ;
 15777                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15778                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15779                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15780                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15781                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15782                                  
 15783                                  checkromchange:	
 15784                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15785                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15786 000018AB 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15787                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15788                                  					; fchanged
 15789 000018B0 C3                      		retn
 15790                                  
 15791                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15792                                  
 15793                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15794                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15795                                  ;
 15796                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15797                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15798                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15799                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15800                                  
 15801                                  resetchanged:	
 15802                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15803                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15804 000018B1 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15805                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15806                                  					; ~fchanged
 15807 000018B6 C3                      		retn
 15808                                  
 15809                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15810                                  
 15811                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15812                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15813                                  ;
 15814                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15815                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15816                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15817                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15818                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15819                                  
 15820                                  haschange:
 15821                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15822                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15823 000018B7 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15824                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15825                                  					; fchangeline
 15826 000018BC C3                      		retn
 15827                                  
 15828                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15829                                  
 15830                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15831                                  
 15832                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15833                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15834                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15835                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15836                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15837                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15838                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15839                                  
 15840                                  ; set_volume_id
 15841                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15842                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15843                                  ;
 15844                                  ;   on entry:
 15845                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15846                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15847                                  ;
 15848                                  ;   on exit:
 15849                                  ;	carry clear:
 15850                                  ;	   successful call
 15851                                  ;	carry set
 15852                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15853                                  
 15854                                  set_volume_id:				
 15855 000018BD 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15856 000018BE 50                      		push	ax
 15857 000018BF E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15858 000018C2 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15859 000018C4 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15860 000018C7 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15861 000018C9 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15862 000018CC E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15863                                  setvret:				
 15864                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15865                                  		; cf = 0
 15866                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15867 000018CF 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15868 000018D0 5A                      		pop	dx
 15869 000018D1 C3                      		retn
 15870                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15871                                  
 15872                                  seterr:					
 15873 000018D2 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15874 000018D3 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15875 000018D4 C3                      		retn
 15876                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15877 000018D5 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15878                                  
 15879                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15880                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15881                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15882                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15883                                  
 15884                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15885                                  
 15886                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15887                                  
 15888                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15889                                  ;
 15890                                  ;   on entry:
 15891                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15892                                  ;
 15893                                  ;   on exit:
 15894                                  ;	carry clear
 15895                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15896                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15897                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15898                                  ;
 15899                                  ;	carry set:
 15900                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15901                                  
 15902                                  read_volume_id:
 15903 000018D7 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15904 000018D8 51                      		push	cx
 15905 000018D9 53                      		push	bx
 15906 000018DA 50                      		push	ax
 15907 000018DB 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15908 000018DC 57                      		push	di
 15909 000018DD 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15910 000018DE 07                      		pop	es
 15911 000018DF BF[0009]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15912 000018E2 BE[F408]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15913 000018E5 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15914 000018E8 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15915 000018EA 5F                      		pop	di
 15916 000018EB 07                      		pop	es
 15917 000018EC 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15918                                  					; # of fats
 15919 000018F0 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15920                                  					; sectors / fat
 15921 000018F4 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15922 000018F6 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15923                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15924                                  					;
 15925                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15926                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15927 000018FA 2EA3[D518]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15928                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15929                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15930 000018FE 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15931                                  					; # root dir entries
 15932 00001902 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15933 00001904 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15934                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15935                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15936 00001906 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15937                                  next_sec:				
 15938 00001907 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15939 00001908 2EA1[D518]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15940                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15941                                  					; get sector #
 15942 0000190C 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15943                                  					; sectors / track
 15944 00001910 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15945 00001912 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15946                                  
 15947                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15948                                  
 15949 00001914 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15950                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15951 00001915 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15952 00001917 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15953 00001919 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15954                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15955 0000191D 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15956 0000191F 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15957 00001921 E849EE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15958                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15959 00001924 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15960 00001926 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15961 00001929 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15962                                  fvid_loop:
 15963                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15964 0000192B 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0
 15965                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15966 0000192D 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15967 0000192F 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15968 00001932 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15969 00001934 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15970 00001937 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15971                                  ent_loop:				
 15972 00001939 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15973 0000193C E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15974 0000193E 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15975 0000193F 2EFF06[D518]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15976                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15977                                  					; next sector
 15978 00001944 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15979                                  notfound:
 15980                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15981                                  		;xor	si, si
 15982 00001946 EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15983                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15984                                  
 15985                                  found_vid:
 15986                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15987                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  				
 15988 00001948 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15989 00001949 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15990 0000194B 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15991 0000194C 57                      		push	di
 15992 0000194D 1E                      		push	ds
 15993 0000194E 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15994 0000194F BF[0009]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15995 00001952 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15996                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15997 00001955 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15998                                  		;xor	al, al
 15999                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16000 00001957 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 16001 00001958 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 16002                                  		;;xor	si, si
 16003                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16004                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 16005 00001959 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 16006 0000195A 07                      		pop	es
 16007                                  fvid_ret:
 16008                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16009 0000195B 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16010                                  				
 16011 0000195D 58                      		pop	ax
 16012                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16013                                  		; cf = 0
 16014                                  		;clc
 16015                                  rvidret:
 16016 0000195E 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 16017 0000195F 59                      		pop	cx
 16018 00001960 5A                      		pop	dx
 16019 00001961 C3                      		retn
 16020                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16021                                  
 16022                                  no_vid:
 16023 00001962 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16024                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 16025                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16026 00001963 EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16027                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16028                                  
 16029                                  readviderr:				
 16030 00001965 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 16031 00001966 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 16032 00001967 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 16033                                  
 16034                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16035                                  
 16036                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 16037                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 16038                                  preset_volid_addr:
 16039 00001969 BE[0009]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 16040                                  		;
 16041                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 16042                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 16043                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 16044                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 16045 0000196C 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16046 0000196F B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16047                                  		;
 16048 00001972 FC                      		cld
 16049 00001973 C3                      		retn
 16050                                  
 16051                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16052                                  
 16053                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16054                                  ;
 16055                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 16056                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 16057                                  
 16058                                  transfer_volume_id:
 16059 00001974 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16060                                  		;push	si
 16061 00001975 51                      		push	cx
 16062                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16063 00001976 56                      		push	si
 16064                                  
 16065                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16066                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16067                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16068                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16069                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16070                                  		;cld
 16071                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16072 00001977 E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16073                                  
 16074 0000197A F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16075                                  		
 16076                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16077 0000197C 5E                      		pop	si
 16078                                  chk_volid_ok:
 16079 0000197D 59                      		pop	cx
 16080                                  		;pop	si
 16081 0000197E 5F                      		pop	di
 16082 0000197F C3                      		retn
 16083                                  
 16084                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16085                                  
 16086                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 16087                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 16088                                  ;
 16089                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 16090                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 16091                                  
 16092                                  check_volume_id:
 16093 00001980 57                      		push	di
 16094 00001981 51                      		push	cx
 16095                                  		
 16096                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16097                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16098                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16099                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16100                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16101                                  		;cld
 16102                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16103 00001982 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16104                                  
 16105 00001985 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 16106                                  		
 16107                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16108                                  		;pop	cx
 16109                                  		;pop	di
 16110                                  		;retn
 16111 00001987 EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 16112                                  
 16113                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16114                                  
 16115                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16116                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 16117                                  ;
 16118                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 16119                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 16120                                  ;
 16121                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 16122                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 16123                                  ;
 16124                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 16125                                  
 16126                                  fat_check:
 16127 00001989 50                      		push	ax
 16128 0000198A 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 16129 0000198C A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 16130 0000198F 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 16131                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 16132 00001993 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 16133 00001995 4E                      		dec	si
 16134                                  okret1:
 16135 00001996 58                      		pop	ax
 16136 00001997 C3                      		retn

 16159                                  %endif
 16160                                  
 16161                                  ;align 16
 16162                                  
 16163                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16164                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 16165                                  ; 29/09/2023
 16166                                  BCODEEND:
 16167                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 16168                                  ; 13/12/2022
 16169                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 16170                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 16171                                  
 16172                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------

 16184                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT

 16186                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 16187                                  
 16188                                  section .SYSINIT vstart=0
 16189                                  
 16190                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16191                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 16192                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16193                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 31/12/2022))
 16194                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16195                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 16196                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16197                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 16198                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16199                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit5.s -l sysinit5.lst -o SYSINIT5.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 16200                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16201                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 16202                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16203                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 16204                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 16205                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16206                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 16207                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 16208                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16209                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 16210                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 16211                                  
 16212                                  ; 21/10/2022
 16213                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16214                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 16215                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 16216                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 16217                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16218                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 16219                                  
 16220                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16221                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 16222                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16223                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 16224                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 16225                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 16226                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 16227                                  ;
 16228                                  ;
 16229                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 16230                                  ;
 16231                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 16232                                  ;
 16233                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 16234                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16235                                  ;
 16236                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 16237                                  ;
 16238                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 16239                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16240                                  ;
 16241                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 16242                                  ;
 16243                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 16244                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 16245                                  ;value.
 16246                                  ;
 16247                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 16248                                  ;
 16249                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 16250                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 16251                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 16252                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 16253                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 16254                                  ;
 16255                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 16256                                  ;
 16257                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 16258                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 16259                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 16260                                  ;
 16261                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 16262                                  ;
 16263                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 16264                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16265                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 16266                                  ;
 16267                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 16268                                  ;
 16269                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 16270                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16271                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 16272                                  ;
 16273                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 16274                                  ;
 16275                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 16276                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 16277                                  ;
 16278                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 16279                                  ;
 16280                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 16281                                  ;
 16282                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 16283                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 16284                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 16285                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 16286                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 16287                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 16288                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 16289                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 16290                                  ;memory.
 16291                                  ;NOTES:
 16292                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 16293                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 16294                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 16295                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 16296                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 16297                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 16298                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 16299                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 16300                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 16301                                  
 16302                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16303                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 16304                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16305                                  
 16306                                  ;include version.inc
 16307                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16308                                  
 16309                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 16310                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 16311                                  
 16312                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 16313                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 16314                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 16315                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 16316                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 16317                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 16318                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 16319                                  
 16320                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 16321                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16322                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 16323                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 16324                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 16325                                  
 16326                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 16327                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16328                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 16329                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 16330                                  
 16331                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 16332                                  
 16333                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 16334                                  				; currently 0.
 16335                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 16336                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 16337                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 16338                                  
 16339                                  ;      if1
 16340                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 16341                                  ;      endif
 16342                                  
 16343                                         ;******************************
 16344                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 16345                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 16346                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 16347                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 16348                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 16349                                         ;******************************

 16356                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 16357                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 16358                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 16359                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 16360                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 16361                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 16362                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special

 16379 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word

 16399                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read

 16415 00000000 ??                      .fcb_drive:	resb 1
 16416 00000001 ????????????????        .fcb_name:	resb 8
 16417 00000009 ??????                  .fcb_ext:	resb 3
 16418 0000000C ????                    .fcb_EXTENT:	resw 1
 16419 0000000E ????                    .fcb_RECSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of record (user settable)
 16420 00000010 ????                    .fcb_FILSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of file in bytes; used with the following
 16421                                                          ; word
 16422 00000012 ????                    .fcb_DRVBP:	resw 1	; BP for SEARCH FIRST and SEARCH NEXT
 16423 00000014 ????                    .fcb_FDATE:	resw 1	; Date of last writing
 16424 00000016 ????                    .fcb_FTIME:	resw 1	; Time of last writing
 16425 00000018 ??                      .fcb_DEVID:	resb 1	; Device ID number, bits 0-5 if file.
 16426                                                          ; bit 7=0 for file, bit 7=1 for I/O device
 16427                                                          ; If file, bit 6=0 if dirty
 16428                                                          ; If I/O device, bit 6=0 if EOF (input)
 16429                                                          ;               Bit 5=1 if Raw mode
 16430                                                          ;               Bit 0=1 if console input device
 16431                                                          ;               Bit 1=1 if console output device
 16432                                                          ;               Bit 2=1 if null device
 16433                                                          ;               Bit 3=1 if clock device
 16434 00000019 ????                    .fcb_FIRCLUS:	resw 1	; First cluster of file
 16435 0000001B ????                    .fcb_CLUSPOS:	resw 1	; Position of last cluster accessed
 16436 0000001D ????                    .fcb_LSTCLUS:	resw 1	; Last cluster accessed and directory
 16437 0000001F ??                                   	resb 1	; pack 2 12 bit numbers into 24 bits...
 16438 00000020 ??                      .fcb_NR:	resb 1	; Next record
 16439 00000021 ????????                .fcb_RR:	resb 4	; Random record
 16440                                  .size:

 16444                                  ; Field definition for I/O buffer information

 16447                                  
 16448                                  struc buffinfo
 16449 00000000 ????                    .buf_next:	resw 1	; Pointer to next buffer in list
 16450 00000002 ????                    .buf_prev:	resw 1	; Pointer to previous buffer in list
 16451 00000004 ??                      .buf_ID:	resb 1	; Drive of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 16452                                  			; SFT table index (bit 7 = 1)
 16453                                  			; = FFh if buffer free
 16454 00000005 ??                      .buf_flags:	resb 1	; Bit 7 = 1 if Remote file buffer
 16455                                  			;	= 0 if Local device buffer
 16456                                  			; Bit 6 = 1 if buffer dirty
 16457                                  			; Bit 5 = Reserved
 16458                                  			; Bit 4 = Search bit (bit 7 = 1)
 16459                                  			; Bit 3 = 1 if buffer is DATA
 16460                                  			; Bit 2 = 1 if buffer is DIR
 16461                                  			; Bit 1 = 1 if buffer is FAT
 16462                                  			; Bit 0 = Reserved
 16463 00000006 ????????                .buf_sector:	resd 1	; Sector number of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 16464                                  ; The next two items are often refed as a word (bit 7 = 0)
 16465 0000000A ??                      .buf_wrtcnt:	resb 1	; For FAT sectors, # times sector written out
 16466 0000000B ????                    .buf_wrtcntinc:	resw 1	; "   "     "   , # sectors between each write
 16467 0000000D ????????                .buf_DPB :	resd 1	; Pointer to drive parameters
 16468 00000011 ????                    .buf_fill:	resw 1	; How full buffer is (bit 7 = 1)
 16469 00000013 ??                      .buf_reserved:	resb 1	; make DWORD boundary for 386
 16470                                  .size:
 16471                                  endstruc
 16472                                  
 16473                                  %define buf_offset	dword [buf_sector]
 16474                                  			;For bit 7 = 1, this is the byte
 16475                                  			;offset of the start of the buffer in
 16476                                  			;the file pointed to by buf_ID.  Thus
 16477                                  			;the buffer starts at location
 16478                                  			;buf_offset in the file and contains
 16479                                  			;buf_fill bytes.
 16480
