 31762                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31763                                  
 31764                                  isSpecified:
 31765                                  	push	ax
 31766                                  
 31767                                  	xor	bh,bh
 31768                                  	mov	bl,al
 31769                                  
 31770                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 31771                                  	;
 31772                                  	;push	ds
 31773                                  	;push	cs
 31774                                  	;pop	ds
 31775                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 31776                                  	;pop	ds
 31777                                  	
 31778                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 31779                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 31780                                  
 31781                                  	pop	ax
 31782                                  	retn
 31783                                  
 31784                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31785                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 31786                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31787                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 31788                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 31789                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 31790                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31791                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31792                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 31793                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 31794                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 31795                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 31796                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 31797                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31798                                  
 31799                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 31800                                  
 31801                                  shrinkMCB:
 31802                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 31803                                  	push	bx
 31804                                  	push	cx
 31805                                  	push	es
 31806                                  
 31807                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 31808                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 31809                                  
 31810                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31811                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 31812                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 31813                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 31814                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31815                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 31816                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 31817                                  
 31818                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31819                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31820                                  
 31821                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 31822                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 31823                                  
 31824                                  	add	ax,bx
 31825                                  	inc	ax
 31826                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 31827                                  
 31828                                  	mov	ax,cx
 31829                                  	sub	ax,bx
 31830                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31831                                  	; ax > 0
 31832                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 31833                                  
 31834                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31835                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 31836                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 31837                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 31838                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31839                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 31840                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 31841                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 31842                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 31843                                  
 31844                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31845                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 31846                                  
 31847                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31848                                  	; cf=0
 31849                                  	;clc
 31850                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31851                                  	;jmp	short smX
 31852                                  smE:	
 31853                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31854                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 31855                                  	;stc
 31856                                  smX:	
 31857                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 31858                                  	pop	es
 31859                                  	pop	cx
 31860                                  	pop	bx
 31861                                  	retn
 31862                                  
 31863                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31864                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 31865                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31866                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 31867                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 31868                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31869                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 31870                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31871                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 31872                                  ;
 31873                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 31874                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 31875                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 31876                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 31877                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 31878                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 31879                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 31880                                  ;       Endif
 31881                                  ;    Endif
 31882                                  ; Endif
 31883                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 31884                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 31885                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 31886                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 31887                                  ;    ENDIF
 31888                                  ; ENDIF
 31889                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31890                                  
 31891                                  _hideUMB_:
 31892                                  	push	bx
 31893                                  	push	dx
 31894                                  	push	es
 31895                                  
 31896                                  	mov	al,cl
 31897                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 31898                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31899                                  
 31900                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 31901                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 31902                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 31903                                  
 31904                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 31905                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 31906                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 31907                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 31908                                  
 31909                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 31910                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 31911                                  
 31912                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 31913                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 31914                                  
 31915                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 31916                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 31917                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 31918                                  hu_10:	
 31919                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 31920                                  	jz	short hu_20
 31921                                  
 31922                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 31923                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 31924                                  
 31925                                  	mov	dx,es
 31926                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 31927                                  
 31928                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 31929                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 31930                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 31931                                  
 31932                                  	xor	dx,dx
 31933                                  hu_30:	
 31934                                  	mov	al,cl
 31935                                  
 31936                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 31937                                  
 31938                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 31939                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 31940                                  
 31941                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 31942                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 31943                                  hu_X:	
 31944                                  	pop	es
 31945                                  	pop	dx
 31946                                  	pop	bx
 31947                                  	retn
 31948                                  
 31949                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31950                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 31951                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31952                                  ; Entry:  None
 31953                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 31954                                  ; Error:  None
 31955                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31956                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31957                                  
 31958                                  UnFreeze:
 31959                                  	push	ax
 31960                                  	push	es
 31961                                  
 31962                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31963                                  	jc	short ufX
 31964                                  
 31965                                  	mov	es,ax
 31966                                  
 31967                                  ; ------------------------------
 31968                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31969                                  ; ------------------------------
 31970                                  
 31971                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 31972                                  	jnz	short uf20
 31973                                  	call	unHideMCB
 31974                                  uf20:	
 31975                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31976                                  
 31977                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31978                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31979                                  
 31980                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31981                                  	mov     ax,es
 31982                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31983                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31984                                  	inc     ax
 31985                                  	mov     es,ax
 31986                                  
 31987                                  	jmp	short uf10
 31988                                  ufX:	
 31989                                  	pop	es
 31990                                  	pop	ax
 31991                                  	retn
 31992                                  
 31993                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31994                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 31995                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31996                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31997                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 31998                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31999                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32000                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32001                                  
 32002                                  isFrozMCB:
 32003                                  	;push	ax
 32004                                  
 32005                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 32006                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 32007                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 32008                                  	jne	short ifmX
 32009                                  
 32010                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 32011                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 32012                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 32013                                  	jne	short ifmX
 32014                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 32015                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 32016                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 32017                                  	jne	short ifmX
 32018                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 32019                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 32020                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32021                                  	jne	short ifmX
 32022                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 32023                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32024                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32025                                  ifmX:	
 32026                                  	;pop	ax
 32027                                  	retn
 32028                                  
 32029                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32030                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 32031                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32032                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32033                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 32034                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32035                                  ; USES:     None
 32036                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32037                                  
 32038                                  frezMCB:
 32039                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 32040                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 32041                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 32042                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32043                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32044                                  	retn
 32045                                  
 32046                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32047                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 32048                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32049                                  ; Entry:  None
 32050                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 32051                                  ; Error:  None
 32052                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 32053                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32054                                  
 32055                                  FreezeUM:
 32056                                  	push	ax
 32057                                  	push	cx
 32058                                  	push	dx
 32059                                  	push	es
 32060                                  
 32061                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 32062                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32063                                  
 32064                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32065                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 32066                                  
 32067                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32068                                  	mov	es,ax
 32069                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32070                                  
 32071                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 32072                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 32073                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 32074                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 32075                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 32076                                  
 32077                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32078                                  	jnz	short fum20
 32079                                  
 32080                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32081                                  fum20:	
 32082                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 32083                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 32084                                  
 32085                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 32086                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32087                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 32088                                  
 32089                                  	call	frezMCB
 32090                                  fum30:	
 32091                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32092                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32093                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32094                                  
 32095                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 32096                                  	mov     ax,es
 32097                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32098                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32099                                  	inc     ax
 32100                                  	mov     es,ax
 32101                                  	
 32102                                  	jmp	short fum10
 32103                                  
 32104                                  fumX:	pop	es
 32105                                  	pop	dx
 32106                                  	pop	cx
 32107                                  	pop	ax
 32108                                  	retn
 32109                                  
 32110                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32111                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 32112                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32113                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 32114                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 32115                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32116                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 32117                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32118                                  
 32119                                  UmbTest:
 32120                                  	push	ax
 32121                                  	push	bx
 32122                                  	push	ds
 32123                                  	push	es
 32124                                  
 32125                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
 32126                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 32127                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 32128                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 32129                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 32130                                  
 32131                                  	pop	es
 32132                                  	pop	ds
 32133                                  	pop	bx
 32134                                  	pop	ax
 32135                                  	retn
 32136                                  
 32137                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32138                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 32139                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32140                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 32141                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 32142                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32143                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32144                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32145                                  
 32146                                  WalkMem:
 32147                                  	push	ax ; ?
 32148                                  	push	bx ; ?
 32149                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 32150                                  		   	
 32151                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 32152                                  	int	21h
 32153                                  
 32154                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 32155                                  	mov	es,ax
 32156                                  
 32157                                  ; ------------------------------
 32158                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 32159                                  ; ------------------------------
 32160                                  
 32161                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32162                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 32163                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 32164                                  
 32165                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 32166                                  
 32167                                  	mov     bx,es
 32168                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 32169                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32170                                  	inc     bx
 32171                                  	mov     es,bx
 32172                                  		
 32173                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 32174                                  um20:	
 32175                                  	mov	ax,es
 32176                                  
 32177                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 32178                                  
 32179                                  	pop	es ; ?
 32180                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 32181                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 32182                                  	retn
 32183                                  
 32184                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32185                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 32186                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32187                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 32188                                  ; EXIT:     None
 32189                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32190                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 32191                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32192                                  
 32193                                  hl_unlink:
 32194                                  	xor	bh,bh
 32195                                  
 32196                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 32197                                  	;
 32198                                  	;push	ds
 32199                                  	;push	cs
 32200                                  	;pop	ds
 32201                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 32202                                  	;pop	ds
 32203                                  
 32204                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 32205                                  
 32206                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 32207                                  	int	21h
 32208                                  	retn
 32209                                  
 32210                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32211                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 32212                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32213                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32214                                  
 32215                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 32216                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 32217                                  
 32218                                  ;   Modification log:
 32219                                  ;
 32220                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 32221                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 32222                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 32223                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 32224                                  
 32225                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 32226                                  
 32227                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32228                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 32229                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32230                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 32231                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 32232                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 32233                                  ; ERROR:  None
 32234                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 32235                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32236                                  
 32237                                  UnHideUMBs:
 32238                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 32239                                  
 32240                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32241                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 32242                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 32243                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 32244                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 32245                                  ;    every command execution.
 32246                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32247                                  
 32248                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 32249                                  	;
 32250                                  	;push	ds
 32251                                  	;push	cs
 32252                                  	;pop	ds
 32253                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 32254                                  	;pop	ds	
 32255                                  
 32256                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 32257                                  
 32258                                  	or	al,al
 32259                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 32260                                  
 32261                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 32262                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 32263                                  	retn			; that.
 32264                                  uhu10:	
 32265                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 32266                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 32267                                  
 32268                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 32269                                  	;
 32270                                  	;push	es
 32271                                  	;push	cs
 32272                                  	;pop	es
 32273                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 32274                                  	;pop	ds	
 32275                                  
 32276                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 32277                                  
 32278                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 32279                                  
 32280                                  	pop	ax
 32281                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32282                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 32283                                  	retn
 32284                                  
 32285                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32286                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 32287                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32288                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 32289                                  ; EXIT:     None
 32290                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32291                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 32292                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32293                                  
 32294                                  he_unlink:
 32295                                  	xor	bh, bh
 32296                                  
 32297                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 32298                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 32299                                  
 32300                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 32301                                  	int	21h
 32302                                  	retn
 32303                                  
 32304                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32305                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 32306                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32307                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 32308                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 32309                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 32310                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32311                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32312                                  
 32313                                  FreeUMBs:
 32314                                  	push	ax
 32315                                  	push	es
 32316                                  
 32317                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 32318                                  	jc	short fusX
 32319                                  
 32320                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 32321                                  fus10:	
 32322                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32323                                  	jnz	short fus20
 32324                                  	call	freeMCB
 32325                                  fus20:	   
 32326                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32327                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32328                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 32329                                  
 32330                                  	mov	ax,es
 32331                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32332                                  	inc	ax
 32333                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32334                                  
 32335                                  	jmp	short fus10
 32336                                  fusX:	
 32337                                  	pop	es
 32338                                  	pop	ax
 32339                                  	retn
 32340                                  
 32341                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32342                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 32343                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32344                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32345                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 32346                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32347                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32348                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32349                                  
 32350                                  isHideMCB:
 32351                                  	;push	ax
 32352                                  
 32353                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 32354                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 32355                                  
 32356                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 32357                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 32358                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 32359                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 32360                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 32361                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 32362                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 32363                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 32364                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 32365                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 32366                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 32367                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 32368                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 32369                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32370                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 32371                                  ihm_x:	
 32372                                  	;pop	ax
 32373                                  	retn
 32374                                  
 32375                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32376                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 32377                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32378                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 32379                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 32380                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32381                                  ; USES:     AX
 32382                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32383                                  
 32384                                  freeMCB:
 32385                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32386                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 32387                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 32388                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 32389                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 32390                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 32391                                  	retn
 32392                                  
 32393                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32394                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 32395                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32396                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 32397                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 32398                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 32399                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 32400                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32401                                  
 32402                                  HeadUmb:
 32403                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32404                                  
 32405                                  	;push	si ; ?
 32406                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 32407                                  	;push	es
 32408                                  	;push	bx ; *
 32409                                  
 32410                                  	; 09/04/2019
 32411                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 32412                                  
 32413                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 32414                                  	int	21h
 32415                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 32416                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 32417                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 32418                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 32419                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 32420                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 32421                                  
 32422                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 32423                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 32424                                  xhu_e:	
 32425                                  	;stc
 32426                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 32427                                  xhu_x:	
 32428                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 32429                                  	;pop	es	
 32430                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 32431                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 32432                                  	retn
 32433                                  
 32434                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32435                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 32436                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32437                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 32438                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 32439                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32440                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 32441                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32442                                  
 32443                                  linkumb:
 32444                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 32445                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 32446                                  
 32447                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 32448                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 32449                                  
 32450                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 32451                                  	mov	bx,1
 32452                                  	int	21h
 32453                                  lumbX:
 32454                                  	retn
 32455                                  
 32456                                  %endif
 32457                                  
 32458                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32459                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 32460                                  
 32461                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32462                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 32463                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32464                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32465                                  
 32466                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32467                                  ;
 32468                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 32469                                  ;
 32470                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 32471                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 32472                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 32473                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 32474                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 32475                                  ;
 32476                                  ;	Output : none
 32477                                  ;
 32478                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 32479                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 32480                                  ;
 32481                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32482                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 32483                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 32484                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 32485                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 32486                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32487                                  
 32488                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32489                                  InitDevLoad:
 32490                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32491                                  	; ds = cs
 32492 0000276B 803E[7D1E]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 32493                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 32494                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 32495 00002770 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 32496                                  
 32497                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32498                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 32499                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 32500                                  ;
 32501                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 32502                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 32503                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 32504                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 32505                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 32506                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 32507                                  ;
 32508                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 32509                                  ;
 32510                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 32511                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 32512                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 32513                                  ;	pushf
 32514                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 32515                                  ;	popf
 32516                                  ;
 32517                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 32518                                  ;
 32519                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 32520                                  
 32521                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32522                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 32523                                  InitForConv:
 32524                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32525                                  	; ds = cs
 32526 00002772 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 32527                                  					;  current UMB ?
 32528 00002775 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 32529 00002777 E83C04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 32530 0000277A E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 32531 0000277D 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 32532                                  					;  in low memory
 32533                                  InitForHi:
 32534                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32535                                  	; ds = cs
 32536                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 32537                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 32538                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 32539 0000277F A1[731E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 32540 00002782 8B16[6F1E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32541 00002786 0316[711E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 32542 0000278A EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 32543                                  
 32544                                  InitForLo:
 32545                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32546                                  	; ds = cs
 32547                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 32548 0000278C C606[7D1E]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 32549                                  initforlo_x:
 32550                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32551                                  	; ds = cs
 32552                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 32553                                  					;  we are loading low
 32554                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 32555                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 32556 00002791 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 32557 00002794 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 32558                                  idl1:
 32559 00002798 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 32560                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32561                                  	; ds = cs
 32562                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 32563                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 32564                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 32565                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 32566 0000279B A3[621E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 32567 0000279E 8916[641E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 32568 000027A2 C706[661E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 32569 000027A8 A3[681E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 32570 000027AB C3                      	retn
 32571                                  
 32572                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32573                                  ;
 32574                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 32575                                  ;
 32576                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 32577                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 32578                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 32579                                  ;		   current UMB
 32580                                  ;
 32581                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32582                                  
 32583                                  SpaceInUMB:
 32584                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32585                                  	; ds = cs
 32586                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 32587                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 32588                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 32589 000027AC A1[711E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 32590 000027AF 0306[6F1E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 32591 000027B3 2B06[731E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 32592                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32593                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 32594                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 32595                                  	;stc
 32596                                  	;retn
 32597                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32598 000027B7 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 32599 000027BA 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 32600                                  spcinumb1:
 32601 000027BC 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 32602                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32603                                  	; ds = cs
 32604 000027BD 3B06[601E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 32605                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 32606                                  spcinumb2:
 32607 000027C1 C3                      	retn
 32608                                  
 32609                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32610                                  ;
 32611                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 32612                                  ;
 32613                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 32614                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 32615                                  ;
 32616                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32617                                  
 32618                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32619                                  ;
 32620                                  ;PrepareMark:
 32621                                  ;	push	ds
 32622                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 32623                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 32624                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 32625                                  ;	pop	ds
 32626                                  ;
 32627                                  ;	inc	ax
 32628                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32629                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32630                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 32631                                  ;	retn
 32632                                  
 32633                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32634                                  ;
 32635                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 32636                                  ;
 32637                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 32638                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 32639                                  ;		 the device.
 32640                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 32641                                  ;
 32642                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 32643                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 32644                                  ;	UMB.
 32645                                  ;
 32646                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 32647                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 32648                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 32649                                  ;
 32650                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32651                                  
 32652                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 32655                                  GetUMBForDev:

 32735                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32736                                  ;
 32737                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 32738                                  ;
 32739                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 32740                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 32741                                  ;
 32742                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 32743                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 32744                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 32745                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 32746                                  ;
 32747                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 32748                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 32749                                  ;
 32750                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32751                                  
 32752                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32753                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 32754                                  
 32755                                  DevSetMark:
 32756 00002801 06                      	push	es
 32757 00002802 57                      	push	di
 32758 00002803 1E                      	push	ds
 32759 00002804 56                      	push	si
 32760 00002805 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32761 00002807 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 32762 0000280D 40                      	inc	ax
 32763 0000280E 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 32764                                  
 32765                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 32766                                  
 32767 00002812 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 32768                                  	
 32769                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32770                                  	; ds = cs
 32771                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 32772 00002813 C536[F803]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 32773                                  
 32774 00002817 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32775 00002819 FC                      	cld
 32776                                  dsm_again:
 32777 0000281A AC                      	lodsb
 32778 0000281B 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32779 0000281D 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 32780 0000281F 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32781 00002821 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32782                                  isit_slash:
 32783 00002823 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 32784 00002825 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 32785 00002827 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32786 00002829 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32787                                  isit_null:
 32788 0000282B 08C0                    	or	al,al
 32789 0000282D 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 32790 0000282F 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 32791                                  
 32792 00002831 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 32793 00002834 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 32794                                  dsm_next_char:
 32795 00002837 AC                      	lodsb
 32796 00002838 08C0                    	or	al, al
 32797 0000283A 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 32798 0000283C 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 32799 0000283E 7403                    	je	short blankout
 32800 00002840 AA                      	stosb
 32801 00002841 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 32802                                  blankout:
 32803 00002843 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 32804 00002845 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 32805 00002847 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 32806                                  dsm_exit:
 32807 00002849 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 32808 0000284A 5E                      	pop	si
 32809 0000284B 1F                      	pop	ds
 32810 0000284C 5F                      	pop	di
 32811 0000284D 07                      	pop	es
 32812 0000284E C3                      	retn

 32816                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 32817                                  ;
 32818                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 32819                                  ;
 32820                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 32821                                  ;
 32822                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 32823                                  ;	in DevSize
 32824                                  ;
 32825                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32826                                  
 32827                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32828                                  SizeDevice:
 32829                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32830                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32831 0000284F 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 32832 00002850 06                      	push	es
 32833 00002851 1F                      	pop	ds
 32834 00002852 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 32835 00002854 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 32836 00002857 CD21                    	int	21h
 32837 00002859 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 32838                                  
 32839 0000285B 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 32840 0000285D B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 32841 00002860 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 32842 00002862 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 32843 00002864 CD21                    	int	21h
 32844 00002866 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 32845 00002868 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 32846 0000286B 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32847 0000286E F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 32848 00002872 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 32849 00002874 2EC706[601E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 32850                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 32851 0000287B EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 32852                                  szdev1:
 32853 0000287D B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 32854 0000287F D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 32855 00002881 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 32856 00002883 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 32857 00002885 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 32858                                  	;
 32859                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32860 00002887 2E3B06[7E1E]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32861                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 32862                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32863 0000288C 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 32864                                  
 32865 0000288E 2EA1[7E1E]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32866                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32867 00002892 F8                      	clc
 32868                                  szdev2:
 32869 00002893 2EA3[601E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 32870                                  
 32871                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32872                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32873                                  	; cf=0
 32874                                  	;clc
 32875                                  sd_close:
 32876 00002897 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 32877                                  					;  carry flag
 32878 00002898 B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 32879 0000289B CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 32880 0000289D 9D                      	popf
 32881                                  sd_err:
 32882                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32883                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32884 0000289E 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 32885 0000289F C3                      	retn

 32890                                  ;
 32891                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 32892                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 32893                                  ;
 32894                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 32895                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 32896                                  ;

 32905                                  					;  block for exec with

 32916                                   		; DOS - 2+ - LOAD OR EXECUTE (EXEC)
 32917                                  		; DS:DX -> ASCIZ filename
 32918                                  		; ES:BX -> parameter block
 32919                                  		; AL = subfunction 
 32920 000028BB C3                      	retn

 33246                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33247                                  ;
 33248                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 33249                                  ;
 33250                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 33251                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 33252                                  ;
 33253                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 33254                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 33255                                  ;
 33256                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 33257                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 33258                                  ;
 33259                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33260                                  
 33261                                  ; 13/05/2019
 33262                                  
 33263                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33264                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 33265                                  GetHexNum:
 33266 00002982 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 33267 00002984 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 33268                                  ghn_next:
 33269 00002986 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 33270 00002989 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 33271 0000298C 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 33272 0000298E 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 33273 00002991 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 33274 00002993 50                      	push	ax
 33275 00002994 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 33276 00002996 E82006                  	call	delim
 33277 00002999 58                      	pop	ax
 33278                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33279 0000299A B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 33280 0000299D 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 33281 0000299F E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 33282                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 33283                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33284 000029A2 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 33285                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33286                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33287                                  ghn_shift1:
 33288 000029A4 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 33289 000029A6 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 33290 000029A8 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 33291 000029AA 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 33292 000029AC 46                      	inc	si
 33293 000029AD EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 33294                                  ghn_into_paras:
 33295 000029AF 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 33296 000029B2 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 33297 000029B5 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 33298 000029B9 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 33299                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33300                                  	;mov	cx,4
 33301                                  ghn_shift2:
 33302 000029BB F8                      	clc
 33303 000029BC D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 33304 000029BE D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 33305 000029C0 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 33306 000029C2 F8                      	clc
 33307 000029C3 C3                      	retn
 33308                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33309                                  ghn_err:
 33310                                  gnib_err:
 33311 000029C4 F9                      	stc
 33312                                  ghn_ret:
 33313                                  gnib_ret:
 33314 000029C5 C3                      	retn

 33320                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary

 33323                                  ;

 33325                                  ;

 33333 000029CB 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'

 33344 000029DE 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc

 33358                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
