 33366                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33367                                  ;
 33368                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 33369                                  ;
 33370                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 33371                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 33372                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 33373                                  ;			; DS = data
 33374                                  ;
 33375                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 33376                                  ;
 33377                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 33378                                  ;
 33379                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33380                                  
 33381                                  umb_insert:
 33382 000029E2 1E                      	push	ds
 33383                                  
 33384                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33385                                  	; ds = cs
 33386                                  
 33387                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33388 000029E3 8E1E[8C1E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 33389                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 33390 000029E7 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 33391 000029EB 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 33392 000029ED 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33393                                  ui_next:
 33394 000029EF 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 33395                                  					;    new block
 33396 000029F1 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 33397                                  					; Q: is current block the
 33398                                  					;    last
 33399 000029F3 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33400 000029F9 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 33401                                  					; N: get next block
 33402 000029FB 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 33403                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 33404 000029FD E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33405 00002A00 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 33406                                  
 33407                                  ui_insert:
 33408 00002A02 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 33409 00002A04 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 33410                                  
 33411 00002A05 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 33412 00002A07 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 33413                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 33414 00002A09 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33415                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 33416 00002A0E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33417                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 33418 00002A14 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 33419                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 33420 00002A18 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33421                                  
 33422                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33423                                  
 33424 00002A1E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33425 00002A20 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33426 00002A26 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 33427                                  					; mark as free
 33428 00002A2D 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 33429                                  					; start & end of new block
 33430 00002A30 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 33431                                  
 33432                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 33433                                  	
 33434 00002A35 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 33435 00002A37 43                      	inc	bx
 33436 00002A38 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 33437 00002A3A 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 33438                                  
 33439                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 33440                                  					; this block
 33441 00002A3B 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 33442                                  	
 33443 00002A3D 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33444 00002A43 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33445 00002A4A 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33446 00002A4E 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33447                                  
 33448 00002A55 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 33449                                  
 33450                                  ui_append:
 33451                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 33452 00002A57 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 33453 00002A5C 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 33454                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 33455                                  					; block for the next arena.
 33456                                  	; 13/05/2019
 33457 00002A62 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33458                                  
 33459 00002A68 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 33460 00002A6A 40                      	inc	ax
 33461 00002A6B 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 33462                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 33463 00002A6D F7D8                    	neg	ax
 33464                                  
 33465 00002A6F 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 33466                                  
 33467 00002A71 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 33468 00002A77 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33469 00002A7E 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33470 00002A82 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 33471                                  
 33472                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 33473 00002A89 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 33474 00002A8B 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 33475 00002A91 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 33476                                  					; mark as free
 33477 00002A98 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33478 00002A99 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33479                                  ui_done:
 33480                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 33481 00002A9E 1F                      	pop	ds
 33482                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 33483                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 33484                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 33485 00002A9F C3                      	retn

 33500                                  au_next:

 33502 00002AA8 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce

 33504 00002AAD EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 33505                                  au_coalesce:

 33513                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33514                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 33515                                  
 33516                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33517                                  
 33518                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33519                                  ;
 33520                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 33521                                  ;
 33522                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 33523                                  ;	iff it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 33524                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 33525                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 33526                                  ;
 33527                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 33528                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 33529                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 33530                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 33531                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 33532                                  ;
 33533                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33534                                  
 33535                                  umb_coalesce:
 33536                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33537                                  	; ds = cs
 33538 00002AAF 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 33539                                  
 33540 00002AB0 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 33541                                  
 33542                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33543                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33544 00002AB2 8E06[8C1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33545 00002AB6 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 33546                                  uc_nextfree:
 33547 00002ABB 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33548 00002ABD 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33549                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 33550 00002ABF 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 33551 00002AC4 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 33552                                  					; N: get next arena
 33553 00002AC6 E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 33554 00002AC9 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33555 00002ACB EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 33556                                  uc_again:
 33557 00002ACD E86400                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 33558 00002AD0 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 33559                                  uc_check:
 33560 00002AD2 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 33561 00002AD7 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 33562                                  					; Y: coalesce
 33563 00002AD9 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 33564 00002ADE 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 33565                                  	;add	[3],cx
 33566 00002ADF 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 33567 00002AE3 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 33568 00002AE6 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 33569 00002AE8 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 33570                                  
 33571                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33572                                  ;uc_done:
 33573                                  	;retn

 33622                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33623                                  ;
 33624                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 33625                                  ;
 33626                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 33627                                  ;
 33628                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 33629                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 33630                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 33631                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 33632                                  ;				NC
 33633                                  ;			  else 
 33634                                  ;				CY
 33635                                  ;
 33636                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 33637                                  ;
 33638                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33639                                  
 33640                                  umb_allocate:
 33641                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33642                                  	; ds = cs
 33643 00002B18 50                      	push	ax
 33644 00002B19 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 33645 00002B1B BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 33646                                  					;   possible
 33647                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33648 00002B1E FF1E[751E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 33649                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 33650                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 33651                                  					; the largest UMB
 33652 00002B22 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 33653 00002B24 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 33654                                  	
 33655 00002B26 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 33656                                  
 33657                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33658 00002B28 FF1E[751E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 33659                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 33660

 33662                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 33663                                  	; 14/08/2023
 33664 00002B2F 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 33665                                  ua_err:
 33666 00002B31 F9                      	stc	
 33667                                  
 33668                                  	;clc
 33669                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33670                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33671                                  	; cf=0
 33672                                  	;clc 
 33673                                  ua_done:
 33674 00002B32 58                      	pop	ax
 33675 00002B33 C3                      	retn
 33676                                  	; 14/08/2023
 33677                                  ;ua_err:
 33678                                  	;stc
 33679                                  	;jmp	short ua_done

 33724                                  	; ds = cs

 33730

 33732                                  	; ds = cs

 33735 00002B4E B106                    	mov	cl,6
 33736 00002B50 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 33737

 33740

 33742

 33744                                  	; 09/09/2023

 33746 00002B59 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 33747

 33749 00002B61 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33750                                  					
 33751 00002B68 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33752 00002B6C 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33753

 33755

 33758 00002B7B 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 33759                                  					; mark as free

 33761 00002B83 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx

 33764                                  	; 31/12/2022

 33770                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 33771                                  					;  just below Top of Mem

 33817                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 33818                                  ;
 33819                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 33820                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 33821                                  ;
 33822                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33823                                  
 33824                                  ShrinkUMB:
 33825                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33826                                  	; ds = cs
 33827 00002BB6 833E[6F1E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 33828                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 33829 00002BBB 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 33830 00002BBD 06                      	push	es
 33831 00002BBE 53                      	push	bx
 33832                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33833                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 33834                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33835                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33836 00002BBF 8B1E[731E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 33837 00002BC3 2B1E[6F1E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33838 00002BC7 8E06[6F1E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 33839                                  	
 33840 00002BCB B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 33841 00002BCE CD21                    	int	21h
 33842                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 33843                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 33844                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 33845 00002BD0 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33846 00002BD2 48                      	dec	ax
 33847 00002BD3 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33848 00002BD5 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 33849 00002BDC 5B                      	pop	bx
 33850 00002BDD 07                      	pop	es
 33851                                  su_exit:
 33852 00002BDE C3                      	retn

 33869                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0

 33871                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33872 00002BE8 8E06[8C1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33873                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 33874 00002BEC 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 33875 00002BF1 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 33876                                  ulu_next:
 33877 00002BF6 E83BFF                  	call	get_next
 33878 00002BF9 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 33879 00002BFB 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 33880 00002BFD 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 33881 00002BFF 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33882 00002C01 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 33883                                  ulu_found:

 33885 00002C03 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33886                                  ulu_x:

 33888 00002C09 1F                      	pop	ds

 33891                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33892                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 33893                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33894                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33895                                  
 33896                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33897                                  ;
 33898                                  ; Summary:
 33899                                  ;
 33900                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 33901                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 33902                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 33903                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 33904                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 33905                                  ;
 33906                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 33907                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 33908                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 33909                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 33910                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 33911                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 33912                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 33913                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 33914                                  ;
 33915                                  ; Example:
 33916                                  ;
 33917                                  ;   [menu]
 33918                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 33919                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 33920                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 33921                                  ;
 33922                                  ;   [network]
 33923                                  ;   include misc
 33924                                  ;   device=foo
 33925                                  ;
 33926                                  ;   [misc]
 33927                                  ;   device=bar
 33928                                  ;   include alternate
 33929                                  ;
 33930                                  ;   [alternate]
 33931                                  ;   device=tar
 33932                                  ;
 33933                                  ;
 33934                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 33935                                  ;
 33936                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 33937                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 33938                                  ;
 33939                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 33940                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 33941                                  ;   following order:
 33942                                  ;
 33943                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 33944                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 33945                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 33946                                  ;
 33947                                  
 33948                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 33949                                  
 33950                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 33951                                  
 33952                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 33953                                  
 33954                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 33955                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 33956                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 33957                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 33958                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 33959                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 33960                                  
 33961                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33962                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33963                                  
 33964                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 33965                                  
 33966                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33967                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 33968                                  
 33969 00002C0B 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 33983 00002C0E 53                      	push	bx
 33984 00002C0F 51                      	push	cx
 33985 00002C10 52                      	push	dx
 33986                                  
 33987 00002C11 0E                      	push	cs
 33988 00002C12 1F                      	pop	ds
 33989                                  
 33990 00002C13 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33991 00002C15 8A1E[9535]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 33992                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33993 00002C19 43                      	inc	bx
 33994                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 33995                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 33996 00002C1A BA[6D34]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 33997                                  	;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 33998                                  	;mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 33999                                  	; 14/08/2023

 34001                                  	;mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 34002                                  	;mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 34003                                  	; 14/08/2023
 34004 00002C20 B94008                  	mov	cx,(RAWIO<<8)|SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS 
 34005 00002C23 CD21                    	int	21h
 34006

 34082                                  
 34083                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34084                                  ;
 34085                                  ; procedure : parseline
 34086                                  ;
 34087                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 34088                                  ;
 34089                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34090                                  
 34091                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34092                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 34093                                  
 34094                                  parseline:
 34095                                  	push	ds
 34096                                  
 34097                                  	push	cs
 34098                                  	pop	ds
 34099                                  
 34100                                  nextswtch:
 34101                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 34102                                  	je	short done_line
 34103                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 34104                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 34105                                  
 34106                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 34107                                  
 34108                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 34109                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 34110                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 34111                                  	je	short getparm
 34112                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 34113                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 34114                                  
 34115                                  getparm:
 34116                                  	call	check_switch
 34117                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 34118                                  	jc	short swterr
 34119                                  getnext:
 34120                                  	call	getchr
 34121                                  	jc	short done_line
 34122                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 34123                                  swterr:
 34124                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 34125                                  
 34126                                  done_line:
 34127                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34128                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 34129                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 34130                                  	jnz	short okay
 34131                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 34132                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 34133                                  
 34134                                  okay:
 34135                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 34136                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 34137                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 34138                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 34139                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 34140                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34141                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34142                                  	; cf=0
 34143                                  	;clc
 34144                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 34145                                  exitpl:
 34146                                  	pop	ds
 34147                                  	retn
 34148                                  put_back:
 34149                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 34150                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 34151                                  	jmp	short done_line
 34152                                  
 34153                                  %endif
 34154                                  
 34155                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34156                                  ;
 34157                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 34158                                  ;
 34159                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 34160                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 34161                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 34162                                  ; error.
 34163                                  ;
 34164                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34165                                  
 34166                                  ; 09/09/2023
 34167                                  
 34168                                  err_swtch:
 34169 00002C5F 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 34170                                  err_check:
 34171 00002C61 F9                      	stc
 34172                                  err_chk:
 34173                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 34174 00002C62 C3                      	retn
 34175                                  
 34176                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34177                                  
 34178                                  check_switch:
 34179 00002C63 E87803                  	call	getchr
 34180                                  	;jc	short err_check
 34181 00002C66 72FA                    	jc	short err_chk
 34182 00002C68 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 34183 00002C6A 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 34184                                  	;jb	short err_check
 34185 00002C6C 72F4                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34186 00002C6E 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 34187 00002C70 77EF                    	ja	short err_check
 34188                                  
 34189 00002C72 06                      	push	es
 34190                                  
 34191 00002C73 0E                      	push	cs
 34192 00002C74 07                      	pop	es
 34193                                  
 34194                                  	;mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 34195                                  	;mov	ch,0

 34255                                  ; procedure : process_num
 34256                                  ;

 34258                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 34259                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 34260                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.

 34290                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 34291                                  	; 12/12/2022

 34340                                  ; procedure : parseline
 34341                                  ;
 34342                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 34343                                  ;

 34346                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 34349                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34350                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 34351                                  
 34352                                  	;push	ds ; *
 34353                                  
 34354                                  	;push	cs ; *
 34355                                  	;pop	ds ; *

 34357                                  nextswtch:
 34358 00002CE0 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?

 34361 00002CE6 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 34362                                  
 34363                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 34364                                  
 34365 00002CE8 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?

 34367 00002CEC 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'

 34369 00002CF0 F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 34370                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 34371                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34372                                  swterr:
 34373 00002CF1 C3                      	retn
 34374

 34378 00002CF9 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 34379                                  getnext:
 34380 00002CFB E8E002                  	call	getchr

 34383                                  	; 04/01/2023

 34399                                  	; 04/01/2023

 34401                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 34402                                  	;retn
 34403

 34428                                  ;
 34429                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 34430                                  ;
 34431                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 34432                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 34433                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 34434                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 34435                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 34436                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 34437                                  ;
 34438                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 34439                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 34440                                  ;
 34441                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 34442                                  ;
 34443                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34444                                  
 34445                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34446                                  
 34447                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34448                                  setdeviceparameters:
 34449                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34450                                  	; ds = cs
 34451                                  	
 34452 00002D22 06                      	push	es
 34453                                  
 34454 00002D23 0E                      	push	cs
 34455 00002D24 07                      	pop	es
 34456                                  
 34457 00002D25 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 34458 00002D27 8A1E[6E34]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 34459 00002D2B 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 34460 00002D2E 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 34461                                  
 34462 00002D30 C706[7134]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 34463                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 34464                                  got_80:

 34467

 34497

 34499                                  
 34500                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 34501                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 34502                                  
 34503                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 34504                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34505                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 34506                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34507 00002D60 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 34508 00002D63 A2[7634]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 34509                                  
 34510 00002D66 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 34511                                  
 34512                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 34513                                  
 34514                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 34515                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34516 00002D68 8A3E[7E34]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 34517                                  
 34518                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34519                                  	; ax = 2
 34520 00002D6C 3906[8334]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 34521                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 34522 00002D70 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 34523                                  
 34524 00002D72 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 34525                                  
 34526                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 34527                                  
 34528 00002D74 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 34529                                  
 34530                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 34531                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 34532                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 34533                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 34534                                  
 34535                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 34536                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 34537                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 34538                                  
 34539 00002D76 833E[8134]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 34540 00002D7B 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 34541 00002D7D 833E[7134]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 34542 00002D82 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 34543                                  
 34544                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 34545                                  
 34546 00002D84 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34547                                  
 34548                                  ;	check for 320K
 34549                                  
 34550                                  not_144m:
 34551 00002D86 833E[7134]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 34552 00002D8B 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 34553 00002D8D 833E[8134]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34554 00002D92 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 34555                                  
 34556 00002D94 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 34557 00002D96 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 34558                                  
 34559                                  only_one_head:
 34560                                  
 34561                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 34562                                  
 34563 00002D98 803E[6E34]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 34564 00002D9D 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 34565                                  
 34566                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 34567                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 34568                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 34569                                  
 34570 00002D9F B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 34571 00002DA1 833E[8134]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 34572                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34573 00002DA6 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 34574                                  
 34575 00002DA8 B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 34576                                  
 34577                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 34578                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 34579                                  
 34580                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 34581                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34582                                  	; ax = 2
 34583 00002DAA 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 34584 00002DAB A2[7634]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 34585                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 34586                                  
 34587                                  got_correct_mediad:
 34588 00002DAE 881E[7E34]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 34589                                  
 34590                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 34591                                  
 34592 00002DB2 A1[7134]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 34593 00002DB5 F726[8334]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 34594 00002DB9 F726[8134]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 34595 00002DBD A3[7C34]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 34596 00002DC0 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 34597                                  
 34598 00002DC1 C3                      	retn
 34599                                  
 34600                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine

 35094                                  ;
 35095                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 35096                                  ;
 35097                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 35098                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 35099                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 35100                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 35101                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 35102                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 35103                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 35104                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 35105                                  ;
 35106                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35107                                  
 35108                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35109                                  
 35110                                  skip_comment:
 35111 00002F83 E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 35112                                  
 35113                                  	; 04/01/2023
 35114                                  	; ds = cs	
 35115                                  
 35116 00002F85 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 35117                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 35118 00002F8A 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 35119                                  
 35120 00002F8C 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 35121                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 35122 00002F91 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 35123                                  
 35124 00002F93 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35125                                  	
 35126 00002F96 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 35127                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 35128 00002F9A 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 35129                                  
 35130 00002F9C 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 35131                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 35132 00002FA1 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35133                                  
 35134 00002FA3 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 35135                                  	
 35136 00002FA7 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 35137                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 35138 00002FAB 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 35139                                  skip_cmmt:
 35140 00002FAD E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 35141 00002FAF 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 35142 00002FB2 46                      	inc	si
 35143 00002FB3 49                      	dec	cx
 35144 00002FB4 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 35145 00002FB6 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 35146                                  no_commt:
 35147 00002FB8 C3                      	retn
 35148                                  
 35149                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35150                                  %if 0
 35151                                  
 35152                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35153                                  
 35154                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35155                                  ;
 35156                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 35157                                  ;
 35158                                  ;   INPUT
 35159                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35160                                  ;
 35161                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35162                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 35163                                  ;
 35164                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35165                                  ;       All
 35166                                  ;
 35167                                  ;   HISTORY
 35168                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35169                                  ;
 35170                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35171                                  
 35172                                  kbd_read:
 35173                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 35174                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 35175                                  
 35176                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 35177                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 35178                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 35179                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 35180                                  kbd_loop:
 35181                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 35182                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 35183                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 35184                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35185                                          int     16h             ;
 35186                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35187                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 35188                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 35189                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 35190                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35191                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 35192                                  
 35193                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 35194                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 35195                                  kbd_loopdone:
 35196                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 35197                                  kbd_nodelay:
 35198                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 35199                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 35200                                          int     16h             ;
 35201                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 35202                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 35203                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 35204                                          inc     bx
 35205                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 35206                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35207                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 35208                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 35209                                          int     16h             ;
 35210                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 35211                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 35212                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 35213                                  
 35214                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 35215                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 35216                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 35217                                  	
 35218                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35219                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 35220                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 35221                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 35222                                          call    print
 35223                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 35224                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 35225                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 35226                                  kbd_notf5:
 35227                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 35228                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 35229                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 35230                                  
 35231                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35232                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 35233                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 35234                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 35235                                          call    print           ;
 35236                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 35237                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 35238                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 35239                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 35240                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 35241                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 35242                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 35243                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 35244                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 35245                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 35246                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 35247                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 35248                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 35249                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 35250                                          retn			;
 35251                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 35252                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 35253                                          retn			;
 35254                                  
 35255                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35256                                  ;
 35257                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 35258                                  ;
 35259                                  ;   INPUT
 35260                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 35261                                  ;
 35262                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35263                                  ;       None
 35264                                  ;
 35265                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35266                                  ;       None
 35267                                  ;
 35268                                  ;   HISTORY
 35269                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 35270                                  ;
 35271                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35272                                  
 35273                                  set_numlock:
 35274                                          push    ax
 35275                                          push    ds
 35276                                          sub     ax,ax
 35277                                          mov     ds,ax
 35278                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 35279                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 35280                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 35281                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 35282                                          jmp     short set_done
 35283                                  not_off:
 35284                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 35285                                          stc
 35286                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 35287                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 35288                                  set_done:
 35289                                          pop     ds
 35290                                          pop     ax
 35291                                          retn
 35292                                  
 35293                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35294                                  
 35295                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35296                                  ;
 35297                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 35298                                  ;
 35299                                  ;   INPUT
 35300                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 35301                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 35302                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 35303                                  ;
 35304                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35305                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 35306                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 35307                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 35308                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 35309                                  ;
 35310                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35311                                  ;       All
 35312                                  ;
 35313                                  ;   NOTES
 35314                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 35315                                  ;
 35316                                  ;   HISTORY
 35317                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35318                                  ;
 35319                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35320                                  
 35321                                  menu_check:
 35322                                  
 35323                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 35324                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 35325                                  
 35326                                          push    cx              ;
 35327                                          push    si              ;
 35328                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 35329                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 35330                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35331                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 35332                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 35333                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 35334                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 35335                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35336                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 35337                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35338                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 35339                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 35340                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 35341                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 35342                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 35343                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 35344                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 35345                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 35346                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 35347                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 35348                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 35349                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 35350                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 35351                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 35352                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 35353                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 35354                                          call    get_char        ;
 35355                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 35356                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 35357                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 35358                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 35359                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35360                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 35361                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 35362                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 35363                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 35364                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 35365                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 35366                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35367                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 35368                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 35369                                          pop     si              ;
 35370                                          pop     cx              ;
 35371                                  
 35372                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 35373                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 35374                                  
 35375                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35376                                          jnz	short menu_search
 35377                                  ;
 35378                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 35379                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 35380                                  ;
 35381                                          call    kbd_read
 35382                                          jnc	short menu_search
 35383                                          jmp	menu_abort
 35384                                  
 35385                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 35386                                  
 35387                                  menu_search:
 35388                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 35389                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 35390                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 35391                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 35392                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 35393                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 35394                                  
 35395                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 35396                                  
 35397                                  menu_color:
 35398                                          push    cx              ;
 35399                                          push    dx              ;
 35400                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 35401                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 35402                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 35403                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 35404                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 35405                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 35406                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 35407                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 35408                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 35409                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 35410                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 35411                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 35412                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 35413                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 35414                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 35415                                  check_color:                    ;
 35416                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 35417                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 35418                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35419                                  set_color:
 35420                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 35421                                          pop     dx              ;
 35422                                          pop     cx              ;
 35423                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 35424                                  
 35425                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 35426                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 35427                                  
 35428                                  menu_found:
 35429                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 35430                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 35431                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35432                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 35433                                  
 35434                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 35435                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 35436                                  
 35437                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 35438                                  
 35439                                  menu_process:
 35440                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 35441                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 35442                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35443                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 35444                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 35445                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 35446                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 35447                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 35448                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 35449                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 35450                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 35451                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 35452                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 35453                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 35454                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 35455                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 35456                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 35457                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 35458                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 35459                                          stc                     ;
 35460                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 35461                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35462                                  menu_numlock:
 35463                                          call    set_numlock
 35464                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35465                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 35466                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 35467                                  
 35468                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 35469                                  
 35470                                  menu_default:
 35471                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 35472                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 35473                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 35474                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 35475                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 35476                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 35477                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 35478                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 35479                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 35480                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 35481                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 35482                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 35483                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 35484                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 35485                                  timeout_skip:
 35486                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 35487                                  
 35488                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 35489                                  
 35490                                  menu_item:
 35491                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 35492                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 35493                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 35494                                          call    srch_block      ;
 35495                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 35496                                          stc                     ;
 35497                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 35498                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 35499                                  
 35500                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 35501                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 35502                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 35503                                  
 35504                                  menu_itemfound:
 35505                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 35506                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 35507                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 35508                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 35509                                  
 35510                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 35511                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 35512                                  ;   description...
 35513                                  
 35514                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 35515                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 35516                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 35517                                          call    skip_token      ;
 35518                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35519                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 35520                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 35521                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 35522                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 35523                                  
 35524                                  menu_nextitem:
 35525                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35526                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
