 36564                                  ;
 36565                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36566                                  ;       None
 36567                                  ;
 36568                                  ;   NOTES
 36569                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 36570                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 36571                                  ;
 36572                                  ;   HISTORY
 36573                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36574                                  ;
 36575                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36576                                  
 36577                                  disp_input:
 36578                                          push    ax
 36579                                          cmp     al,' '
 36580                                          jae	short disp_ok
 36581                                          mov     al,' '
 36582                                  disp_ok:
 36583                                          mov     dl,al
 36584                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36585                                          int     21h
 36586                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 36587                                          call    print
 36588                                          pop     ax
 36589                                          retn
 36590                                  
 36591                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36592                                  
 36593                                  disp_num:
 36594                                          push    bx
 36595                                          add     al,'0'
 36596                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 36597                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36598                                          mov     cx,1
 36599                                          int     10h
 36600                                          pop     bx
 36601                                          retn
 36602                                  
 36603                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36604                                  ;
 36605                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 36606                                  ;
 36607                                  ;   INPUT
 36608                                  ;       None
 36609                                  ;
 36610                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36611                                  ;       None
 36612                                  ;
 36613                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36614                                  ;       None
 36615                                  ;
 36616                                  ;   NOTES
 36617                                  ;       None
 36618                                  ;
 36619                                  ;   HISTORY
 36620                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36621                                  ;
 36622                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36623                                  
 36624                                  show_status:
 36625                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 36626                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 36627                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 36628                                          int     10h             ;
 36629                                          push    dx              ; save it
 36630                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 36631                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 36632                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36633                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 36634                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 36635                                          int     10h             ;
 36636                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 36637                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 36638                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 36639                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 36640                                  show_onoff: 
 36641                                          int     10h
 36642                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 36643                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 36644                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 36645                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 36646                                  
 36647                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 36648                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 36649                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 36650                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 36651                                  show_noton:                     ;
 36652                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 36653                                          int     10h             ;
 36654                                  show_done:                      ;
 36655                                          pop     dx              ;
 36656                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 36657                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 36658                                          pop     bx              ;
 36659                                          retn			;
 36660                                  
 36661                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36662                                  
 36663                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36664                                  ;
 36665                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 36666                                  ;
 36667                                  ;   INPUT
 36668                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36669                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36670                                  ;
 36671                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36672                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 36673                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 36674                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 36675                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36676                                  ;
 36677                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36678                                  ;       AX
 36679                                  ;
 36680                                  ;   NOTES
 36681                                  ;       None
 36682                                  ;
 36683                                  ;   HISTORY
 36684                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36685                                  ;
 36686                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36687                                  
 36688                                  skip_token:
 36689                                          call    get_char
 36690                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 36691                                          call    any_delim
 36692                                          jne	short skip_token
 36693                                  skip_check_eol:
 36694                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 36695                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36696                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36697                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36698                                          clc
 36699                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 36700                                  	retn
 36701                                  skip_token_eol:
 36702                                          stc
 36703                                  skip_token_done:
 36704                                          retn
 36705                                  
 36706                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36707                                  ;
 36708                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 36709                                  ;
 36710                                  ;   INPUT
 36711                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36712                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36713                                  ;
 36714                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36715                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36716                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 36717                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 36718                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36719                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 36720                                  ;
 36721                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36722                                  ;       AX
 36723                                  ;
 36724                                  ;   NOTES
 36725                                  ;       None
 36726                                  ;
 36727                                  ;   HISTORY
 36728                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36729                                  ;
 36730                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36731                                  
 36732                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 36733                                          call    get_char        ;
 36734                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 36735                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 36736                                          call    delim           ;
 36737                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 36738                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 36739                                  
 36740                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36741                                  ;
 36742                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 36743                                  ;
 36744                                  ;   INPUT
 36745                                  ;       AL == last character read
 36746                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36747                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36748                                  ;
 36749                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36750                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36751                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 36752                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36753                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36754                                  ;
 36755                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36756                                  ;       AX
 36757                                  ;
 36758                                  ;   NOTES
 36759                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 36760                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 36761                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 36762                                  ;
 36763                                  ;   HISTORY
 36764                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36765                                  ;
 36766                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36767                                  
 36768                                  skip_opt_line:
 36769                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36770                                          je	short skip_line_done
 36771                                       
 36772                                  	; fall into skip_line
 36773                                  
 36774                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36775                                  ;
 36776                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 36777                                  ;
 36778                                  ;   INPUT
 36779                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36780                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36781                                  ;
 36782                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36783                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36784                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36785                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36786                                  ;
 36787                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36788                                  ;       AX
 36789                                  ;
 36790                                  ;   NOTES
 36791                                  ;       None
 36792                                  ;
 36793                                  ;   HISTORY
 36794                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36795                                  ;
 36796                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36797                                  
 36798                                  skip_line:
 36799                                          call    get_char
 36800                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 36801                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36802                                          jne	short skip_line
 36803                                  skip_line_done:
 36804                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36805                                          retn
 36806                                  
 36807                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36808                                  ;
 36809                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 36810                                  ;
 36811                                  ;   INPUT
 36812                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36813                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36814                                  ;
 36815                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36816                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 36817                                  ;       BX == binary #
 36818                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 36819                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36820                                  ;
 36821                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36822                                  ;       AX
 36823                                  ;
 36824                                  ;   NOTES
 36825                                  ;       None
 36826                                  ;
 36827                                  ;   HISTORY
 36828                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36829                                  ;
 36830                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36831                                  
 36832                                  ; 13/05/2019
 36833                                  
 36834                                  get_number:
 36835                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 36836                                  num_loop:
 36837                                          call    get_char        ;
 36838                                          jc	short num_done	;
 36839                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 36840                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 36841                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 36842                                          ja	short num_done	;
 36843                                          push    ax              ;
 36844                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 36845                                          push    dx              ;
 36846                                          mul     bx              ;
 36847                                          pop     dx              ;
 36848                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 36849                                          pop     ax              ;
 36850                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 36851                                          cbw                     ;
 36852                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 36853                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 36854                                  
 36855                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36856                                  ;num_done:
 36857                                          ;retn
 36858                                  
 36859                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36860                                  ;
 36861                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 36862                                  ;
 36863                                  ;   INPUT
 36864                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36865                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36866                                  ;
 36867                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36868                                  ;       AL == next character
 36869                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36870                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36871                                  ;
 36872                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36873                                  ;       AX
 36874                                  ;
 36875                                  ;   NOTES
 36876                                  ;       None
 36877                                  ;
 36878                                  ;   HISTORY
 36879                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36880                                  ;
 36881                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36882                                  
 36883                                  get_char:
 36884                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36885                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36886                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36887                                  	es	
 36888                                  	lodsb
 36889                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 36890                                          retn			;
 36891                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36892                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36893                                  nearby_ret:
 36894                                          retn
 36895                                  
 36896                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36897                                  ;
 36898                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36899                                  ;
 36900                                  ;   INPUT
 36901                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36902                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36903                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36904                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36905                                  ;
 36906                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36907                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36908                                  ;
 36909                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36910                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36911                                  ;
 36912                                  ;   NOTES
 36913                                  ;       None
 36914                                  ;
 36915                                  ;   HISTORY
 36916                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36917                                  ;
 36918                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36919                                  
 36920                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36921                                  query_user:
 36922                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 36923                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 36924                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36925                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 36926                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 36927                                  qu_1:
 36928                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 36929                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 36930                                          push    ax                      ;
 36931                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 36932                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 36933                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 36934                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 36935                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 36936                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36937                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 36938                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 36939                                  query_all:
 36940                                  
 36941                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 36942                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 36943                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 36944                                  
 36945                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36946                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 36947                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36948                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 36949                                  
 36950                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 36951                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 36952                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 36953                                  find_match:                             ;
 36954                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 36955                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 36956                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 36957                                          inc     di                      ;
 36958                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 36959                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 36960                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 36961                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 36962                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 36963                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 36964                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 36965                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 36966                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36967                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 36968                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 36969                                          inc     di                      ;
 36970                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36971                                          int     21h                     ;
 36972                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 36973                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 36974                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 36975                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 36976                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 36977                                  cmd_notset:
 36978                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 36979                                  line_print:                             ;
 36980                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 36981                                          es
 36982                                  	lodsb
 36983                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 36984                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 36985                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 36986                                  non_null:                               ;
 36987                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 36988                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 36989                                          jne	short non_space		;
 36990                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 36991                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 36992                                  non_space:                              ;
 36993                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36994                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 36995                                          int     21h                     ;
 36996                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 36997                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 36998                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 36999                                  
 37000                                  generic_prompt:
 37001                                          call    print                   ;
 37002                                  input_loop:                             ;
 37003                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 37004                                          int     16h                     ;
 37005                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 37006                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 37007                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 37008                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 37009                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 37010                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 37011                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 37012                                  not_func:
 37013                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 37014                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 37015                                          je	short legal_char	;
 37016                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 37017                                          je	short legal_char	;
 37018                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 37019                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 37020                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 37021                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 37022                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 37023                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 37024                                  legal_char:                             ;
 37025                                          call    disp_input              ;
 37026                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 37027                                  
 37028                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 37029                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 37030                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37031                                  	clc
 37032                                  do_cmd:
 37033                                  	pop     ax			;
 37034                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37035                                  	; cf=0
 37036                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 37037                                  	retn
 37038                                  
 37039                                  skip_cmd:
 37040                                  	pop     ax			;
 37041                                  skip_all:
 37042                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 37043                                  	stc
 37044                                  	retn
 37045                                  
 37046                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37047                                  ;
 37048                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 37049                                  ;
 37050                                  ;   INPUT
 37051                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 37052                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37053                                  ;
 37054                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37055                                  ;       None
 37056                                  ;
 37057                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37058                                  ;       None
 37059                                  ;
 37060                                  ;   NOTES
 37061                                  ;       None
 37062                                  ;
 37063                                  ;   HISTORY
 37064                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37065                                  ;
 37066                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37067                                  
 37068                                  print_error:
 37069                                          push    ax
 37070                                          push    bx
 37071                                          push    cx
 37072                                          push    dx
 37073                                          push    ds
 37074                                          push    cs
 37075                                          pop     ds
 37076                                          pushf
 37077                                          call    get_linenum
 37078                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 37079                                          call    error_line
 37080                                          popf
 37081                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 37082                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 37083                                          call    print
 37084                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 37085                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 37086                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 37087                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 37088                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 37089                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 37090                                  pe_1:     
 37091                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 37092                                          call    print
 37093                                  pe_ret: 
 37094                                  	pop     ds
 37095                                          pop     dx
 37096                                          pop     cx
 37097                                          pop     bx
 37098                                          pop     ax
 37099                                  	retn
 37100                                  
 37101                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37102                                  
 37103                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 37104                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 37105                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 37106                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 37107                                  
 37108                                  disable_autoexec:
 37109                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 37110                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37111                                  
 37112                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 37113                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 37114                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 37115                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 37116                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 37117                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 37118                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 37119                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 37120                                  dae_1:
 37121                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 37122                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 37123                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 37124                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 37125                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 37126                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 37127                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 37128                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 37129                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 37130                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 37131                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 37132                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 37133                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 37134                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 37135                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 37136                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 37137                                          dec     bx                      ;
 37138                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 37139                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 37140                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 37141                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 37142                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 37143                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 37144                                          retn
 37145                                  
 37146                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 37147                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37148                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 37149                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 37150                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 37151                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 37152                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 37153                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 37154                                  
 37155                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 37156                                  
 37157                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 37158                                  
 37159                                  
 37160                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37161

 37163                                  ;
 37164                                  ; procedure : delim
 37165                                  ;
 37166                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37167                                  
 37168                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37169                                  ;
 37170                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37171                                  ;
 37172                                  ;any_delim:
 37173                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 37174                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 37175                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 37176                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 37177                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 37178                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 37179                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 37180                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 37181                                  ;
 37182                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 37183                                  
 37184                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37185                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 37186                                  delim:
 37187 00002FB9 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 37188 00002FBB 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 37189                                  
 37190 00002FBD 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 37191 00002FBF 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 37192                                  
 37193                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 37194 00002FC1 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 37195 00002FC3 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 37196 00002FC5 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 37197 00002FC7 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 37198 00002FC9 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 37199 00002FCB 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 37200 00002FCD 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 37201 00002FCF 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 37202 00002FD1 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 37203                                  
 37204                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37205                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37206                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 37207 00002FD3 F8                      	clc	; 09/09/2023 ('SkipDelim' must not be return with cf=1)
 37208                                  ;endif
 37209                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37210                                  delim_ret:
 37211                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 37212 00002FD4 C3                      	retn
 37213

 37226 00002FDC 75F7                    	jne	short newline

 37232                                  	; 10/09/2023

 37275                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 37276                                  ;
 37277                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37278                                  
 37279                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 37280                                  mapcase:
 37281 00002FF5 51                      	push	cx
 37282 00002FF6 56                      	push	si
 37283 00002FF7 1E                      	push	ds
 37284                                  
 37285 00002FF8 06                      	push	es
 37286 00002FF9 1F                      	pop	ds
 37287                                  
 37288                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37289                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37290                                  ;
 37291                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 37292                                  ;;else
 37293                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 37294                                  ;;endif
 37295                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37296 00002FFA 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 37297                                  
 37298                                  convloop:
 37299 00002FFC AC                      	lodsb
 37300 00002FFD 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 37301 00002FFF 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 37302 00003001 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 37303 00003003 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 37304 00003005 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 37305 00003007 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 37306                                  noconv:
 37307                                  
 37308                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37309                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 37310                                  ;;
 37311                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 37312                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 37313                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 37314                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 37315                                  ;;
 37316                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 37317                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 37318                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 37319                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 37320                                  ;check_eol:
 37321                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 37322                                  ;       je	short convdone
 37323                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 37324                                  ;       je	short convdone
 37325                                  ;;endif
 37326                                  	
 37327                                  	; 02/11/2022
 37328 0000300A E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 37329                                  convdone:
 37330 0000300C 1F                      	pop	ds
 37331 0000300D 5E                      	pop	si
 37332 0000300E 59                      	pop	cx
 37333 0000300F C3                      	retn

 37430                                  ; procedure : todigit
 37431                                  ;
 37432                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37433                                  
 37434                                  todigit:
 37435 0000307B 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 37436                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 37437                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37438 0000307D 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 37439                                  	;cmp	al,9
 37440                                  	;ja	short notdig
 37441                                  	;clc
 37442                                  	;retn
 37443                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37444 0000307F 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 37445 00003081 F5                      	cmc
 37446                                  notdig:
 37447                                  	;stc
 37448                                  notdig2:
 37449 00003082 C3                      	retn
 37450                                  
 37451                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37452                                  ;
 37453                                  ; procedure : getnum
 37454                                  ;
 37455                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 37456                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 37457                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 37458                                  ;
 37459                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37460                                  
 37461                                  getnum:
 37462 00003083 53                      	push	bx
 37463 00003084 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 37464                                  b2:
 37465 00003086 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 37466 00003089 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 37467                                  
 37468 0000308B 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 37469 0000308C 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 37470                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 37471                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37472 0000308D B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 37473 0000308F F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 37474 00003091 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 37475 00003092 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 37476 00003094 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 37477 00003097 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 37478                                  
 37479 00003099 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 37480                                  
 37481 0000309A E841FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 37482 0000309D 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 37483 0000309F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 37484 000030A1 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 37485 000030A3 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 37486 000030A5 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 37487 000030A7 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 37488 000030A9 7417                    	je	short b15
 37489 000030AB 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 37490 000030B0 7410                    	je	short b15
 37491 000030B2 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 37492                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 37493                                  	;nop
 37494                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37495                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37496                                  	;nop
 37497                                  	;nop
 37498 000030B4 740C                    	je	short b15
 37499 000030B6 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 37500 000030B8 7408                    	je	short b15
 37501 000030BA 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 37502 000030BC 7404                    	je	short b15
 37503 000030BE 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 37504 000030C0 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 37505                                  b15:
 37506 000030C2 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 37507 000030C7 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 37508                                  b1:
 37509 000030CC 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 37510 000030CE 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 37511 000030D0 5B                      	pop	bx
 37512 000030D1 C3                      	retn
 37513                                  badnum:
 37514                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37515                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 37516 000030D2 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 37517                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 37518 000030D4 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 37519 000030D8 5B                      	pop	bx
 37520 000030D9 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 37521 000030DA C3                      	retn
 37522                                  
 37523                                  ;****************************************************************************
 37524                                  
 37525                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 37526                                  
 37527                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37528                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 37529                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 37530                                  ;	si = 0
 37531                                  ;	ax = country id
 37532                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 37533                                  ;	bx = file handle
 37534                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 37535                                  ;
 37536                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 37537                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 37538                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 37539                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 37540                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37541                                  
 37542                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37543                                  
 37544 000030DB 57                      	push	di
 37545 000030DC 50                      	push	ax
 37546 000030DD 52                      	push	dx
 37547                                  
 37548 000030DE 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 37549 000030E0 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 37550 000030E2 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 37551 000030E5 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 37552 000030E8 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37553                                  
 37554 000030EA 06                      	push	es
 37555 000030EB 56                      	push	si
 37556                                  
 37557 000030EC 0E                      	push	cs
 37558 000030ED 07                      	pop	es
 37559                                  
 37560 000030EE BF[5233]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 37561 000030F1 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 37562 000030F4 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 37563                                  
 37564 000030F6 5E                      	pop	si
 37565 000030F7 07                      	pop	es
 37566 000030F8 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 37567                                  
 37568 000030FA 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 37569 000030FD 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 37570 00003100 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 37571                                  
 37572 00003102 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 37573 00003103 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 37574 00003105 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 37575 00003108 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 37576 0000310B E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 37577 0000310E 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37578                                  
 37579 00003110 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 37580 00003112 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 37581 00003116 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37582                                  
 37583 00003118 46                      	inc	si
 37584 00003119 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 37585 0000311A 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 37586 0000311B 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 37587 0000311C 5F                      	pop	di
 37588                                  
 37589                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 37590 0000311D 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 37591 00003120 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 37592                                  
 37593                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 37594                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 37595                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37596 00003122 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 37597 00003124 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 37598 00003126 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 37599 00003129 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 37600                                  
 37601                                  setdoscntry_next:
 37602 0000312B 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 37603 0000312D 46                      	inc	si
 37604 0000312E 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 37605 0000312F E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 37606                                  
 37607                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 37608                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37609 00003131 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 37610                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 37611 00003132 F9                      	stc
 37612 00003133 C3                      	retn
 37613                                  
 37614                                  setdosdata_fail:
 37615 00003134 5E                      	pop	si
 37616 00003135 59                      	pop	cx
 37617 00003136 5F                      	pop	di
 37618 00003137 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 37619                                  
 37620                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 37621 00003139 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 37622                                  
 37623                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 37624 0000313C 2E8916[5A33]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 37625 00003141 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 37626 00003144 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 37627 00003147 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 37628 0000314A E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 37629 0000314D 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 37630                                  
 37631 0000314F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 37632 00003151 46                      	inc	si
 37633 00003152 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 37634                                  
 37635                                  setdoscntry_data:
 37636 00003153 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 37637 00003154 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 37638 00003155 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 37639

 37641 00003159 E8A400                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di

 37643

 37645 00003161 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 37646 00003164 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37647 00003167 F9                      	stc
 37648 00003168 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37649 0000316A 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37650                                  
 37651 0000316C BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 37652 0000316F B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 37653 00003172 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 37654 00003174 F9                      	stc
 37655 00003175 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 37656 00003177 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 37657                                  
 37658 00003179 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 37659 0000317B 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 37660                                  
 37661 0000317D 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 37662 00003180 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 37663 00003183 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37664 00003186 F9                      	stc
 37665 00003187 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 37666 00003189 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37667                                  
 37668 0000318B 56                      	push	si
 37669 0000318C BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 37670 0000318F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 37671 00003191 5E                      	pop	si
 37672 00003192 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 37673 00003195 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 37674 00003198 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 37675 0000319A F9                      	stc
 37676 0000319B CD21                    	int	21h
 37677 0000319D 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 37678                                  
 37679 0000319F 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 37680 000031A1 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 37681                                  
 37682 000031A3 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 37683 000031A6 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 37684 000031A9 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 37685 000031AB 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 37686 000031AC 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 37687 000031AD 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 37688 000031B1 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 37689                                  
 37690                                  	;if	bugfix
 37691 000031B3 E83100                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 37692                                  	;endif
 37693                                  
 37694 000031B6 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 37695 000031B8 7511                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 37696                                  
 37697 000031BA 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 37698                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 37699 000031BE 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]

 37701

 37703

 37707                                  	;pop	ax

 37711

 37719                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 37720 000031D6 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 37721                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 37722                                  
 37723                                  setdoscntry_data_next:
 37724 000031DA 5E                      	pop	si			;restore control buffer pointer
 37725 000031DB 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left
 37726 000031DC 5F                      	pop	di			;restore pointer to dso_country_cdpg
 37727 000031DD 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 37728 000031DF 46                      	inc	si
 37729 000031E0 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 37730 000031E1 49                      	dec	cx
 37731                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37732 000031E2 741B                    	jz	short setdoscntry_ok 
 37733                                  	;cmp	cx,0
 37734                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_ok
 37735 000031E4 E96CFF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data
 37736                                  
 37737                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37738                                  ;setdoscntry_ok:
 37739                                  	;retn

 37748 000031E7 3C07                    	cmp	al,SetDBCS ; 7		; dbcs vector set?
 37749 000031E9 7514                    	jne	short sdbcsbc		; jump if not
 37750

 37783                                  
 37784                                  getcountrydestination:
 37785                                  
 37786                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37787                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 37788                                  ;
 37789                                  ;input: al - data id
 37790                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 37791                                  ;on return:
 37792                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 37793                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 37794                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37795                                  
 37796                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37797                                  
 37798 00003200 51                      	push	cx
 37799                                  	;add	di,74
 37800 00003201 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 37801                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 37802 00003204 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 37803 00003207 47                      	inc	di
 37804 00003208 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 37805                                  
 37806                                  getcntrydest:
 37807 00003209 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 37808 0000320C 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 37809                                  
 37810 0000320E 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 37811 00003212 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 37812                                  
 37813 00003214 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 37814 00003217 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 37815                                  
 37816                                  getcntrydest_1:
 37817                                  	;add	di,41
 37818 00003219 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 37819                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 37820 0000321C E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 37821 0000321E F9                      	stc
 37822                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 37823                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 37824                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37825 0000321F 59                      	pop	cx
 37826 00003220 C3                      	retn
 37827                                  
 37828                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 37829                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37830 00003221 47                      	inc	di
 37831                                  
 37832                                  ;	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 37833                                  ;	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 37834                                  ;
 37835                                  ;	;inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 37836                                  ;	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 37837                                  
 37838                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37839 00003222 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 37840 00003224 74F9                    	je	short getcntrydest_exit
 37841                                  
 37842                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 37843                                  	;les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 37844                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37845 00003226 26C43D                  	les	di,[es:di]
 37846                                  ;getcntrydest_exit:
 37847 00003229 59                      	pop	cx
 37848 0000322A C3                      	retn
 37849                                  
 37850                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37851                                  
 37852                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 37853                                  
 37854                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37855                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 37856                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 37857                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 37858                                  ;
 37859                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 37860                                  ;	 be moved.
 37861                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 37862                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 37863                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 37864                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 37865                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 37866                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 37867                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37868                                  
 37869 0000322B 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 37870 0000322C B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37871 0000322F F9                      	stc
 37872 00003230 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37873 00003232 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37874 00003233 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37875                                  
 37876 00003235 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37877 00003237 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37878 00003239 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37879 0000323B F9                      	stc
 37880 0000323C CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37881                                  ricb_exit:
 37882 0000323E C3                      	retn
 37883
