 37886                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 37887                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023 (Retro DOS v4.2)
 37888                                  %if 0
 37889                                  
 37890                                  set_country_path:
 37891                                  
 37892                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37893                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37894                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37895                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37896                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37897                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37898                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37899                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37900                                  
 37901                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37902                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37903                                  
 37904                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37905                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:36DDh)
 37906                                  
 37907                                  	push	si
 37908                                  
 37909                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37910                                  	push	es
 37911                                  	pop	ds
 37912                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37913                                  
 37914                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37915                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37916                                  
 37917                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37918                                  	inc	si
 37919                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37920                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37921                                  
 37922                                  scp_default_drv:
 37923                                  	mov	ah,19h
 37924                                  	int	21h
 37925                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37926                                  
 37927                                  scp_setdrv:
 37928                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37929                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 37930                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37931                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 37932                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 37933                                  
 37934                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37935                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37936                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37937                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37938                                  	jne	short scp_path
 37939                                  
 37940                                  scp_root_dir:
 37941                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37942                                  scp_path:
 37943                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37944                                  
 37945                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37946                                  scpath_exit:
 37947                                  
 37948                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37949                                  	push	es
 37950                                  	pop	ds
 37951                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37952                                  
 37953                                  	pop	si
 37954                                  	retn
 37955                                  
 37956                                  %endif
 37957                                  
 37958                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37959                                  
 37960                                  chk_drive_letter:
 37961                                  
 37962                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 37963                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 37964                                  ;carry set if not.
 37965                                  
 37966                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37967                                  
 37968 0000323F 50                      	push	ax
 37969 00003240 803C41                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 37970                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 37971 00003243 720C                    	jb	short cdletter_exit
 37972 00003245 803C5A                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 37973 00003248 7706                    	ja	short cdletter_no
 37974 0000324A 807C013A                	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 37975                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 37976                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 37977                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37978 0000324E 7401                    	je	short cdletter_exit
 37979                                  
 37980                                  cdletter_no:
 37981 00003250 F9                      	stc
 37982                                  cdletter_exit:
 37983 00003251 58                      	pop	ax
 37984 00003252 C3                      	retn
 37985                                  
 37986                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37987                                  
 37988                                  move_asciiz:
 37989                                  
 37990                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 37991                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 37992                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 37993                                  
 37994                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37995                                  
 37996                                  masciiz_loop:
 37997                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37998 00003253 F604FF                  	test	byte [si],0FFh
 37999 00003256 A4                      	movsb
 38000                                  	;cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 38001                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 38002 00003257 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023
 38003 00003259 C3                      	retn
 38004                                  
 38005                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38006                                  
 38007                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 38008                                  ;
 38009                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 38010                                  
 38011                                  badfil:
 38012 0000325A 0E                      	push	cs
 38013 0000325B 07                      	pop	es
 38014                                  
 38015 0000325C 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 38016                                  badload:
 38017 0000325E BA[9B36]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 38018 00003261 BB[5836]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 38019                                  prnerr:
 38020 00003264 0E                      	push	cs
 38021 00003265 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 38022 00003266 E81D00                  	call	print
 38023                                  prn1:
 38024 00003269 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 38025 0000326C 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 38026 0000326E 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 38027 00003270 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 38028 00003272 CD21                    	int	21h
 38029 00003274 46                      	inc	si
 38030 00003275 EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 38031                                  prn2:
 38032 00003277 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 38033 00003279 E80A00                  	call	print
 38034                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38035                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 38036 0000327C 803E[D103]01            	cmp	byte [donotshownum],1 ; suppress line number when handling command.com
 38037                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1 
 38038 00003281 7407                    	je	short prnexit
 38039                                  	
 38040                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38041                                  	;call	error_line
 38042 00003283 E91FF4                  	jmp	error_line
 38043                                  ;prnexit:
 38044                                  	;retn
 38045                                  
 38046                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38047                                  
 38048                                  print:
 38049 00003286 B409                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_STRING_OUTPUT ; 9
 38050 00003288 CD21                    	int	21h
 38051                                  prnexit:	; 18/12/2022
 38052 0000328A C3                      	retn
 38053                                  
 38054                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38055                                  
 38056                                  ;  open device pointed to by dx, al has access code
 38057                                  ;   if unable to open do a device open null device instead
 38058                                  
 38059                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38060                                  	; (SYSINIT:3764h)
 38061                                  open_dev:
 38062 0000328B E80500                  	call	open_file
 38063 0000328E 7309                    	jnc	short open_dev3
 38064                                  
 38065                                  open_dev1:
 38066 00003290 BA[F332]                	mov	dx,nuldev
 38067                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38068                                  	;call	open_file
 38069                                  ;of_retn:
 38070                                  	;retn
 38071                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38072                                  	;jmp	short open_file
 38073                                  open_file:
 38074 00003293 B43D                    	mov	ah,OPEN	; 3Dh
 38075 00003295 F9                      	stc
 38076 00003296 CD21                    	int	21h
 38077                                  of_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 38078 00003298 C3                      	retn
 38079                                  
 38080                                  open_dev3:
 38081 00003299 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; handle from open to bx
 38082                                  	;;xor	ax,ax			; get device info
 38083                                  	;;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 38084                                  	;mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8) ; 13/05/2019
 38085                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38086                                  	;xor	ax,ax
 38087                                  	;mov	ah,44h	; IOCTL
 38088                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38089 0000329B B80044                  	mov	ax,4400h ; IOCTL<<8 
 38090                                  
 38091 0000329E CD21                    	int	21h
 38092                                  
 38093 000032A0 F6C280                  	test	dl,10000000b ; 80h
 38094 000032A3 75F3                    	jnz	short of_retn
 38095                                  
 38096 000032A5 B43E                    	mov	ah,CLOSE ; 3Eh
 38097 000032A7 CD21                    	int	21h
 38098 000032A9 EBE5                    	jmp	short open_dev1
 38099
